158 void PM_AddTouchEnt(int entityNum)
159 {
160  int i;
161 
162  if (entityNum == ENTITYNUM_WORLD)
163  {
164  return;
165  }
166  if (pm->numtouch == MAXTOUCH)
167  {
168  return;
169  }
170 
171  // see if it is already added
172  for (i = 0 ; i < pm->numtouch ; i++)
173  {
174  if (pm->touchents[i] == entityNum)
175  {
176  return;
177  }
178  }
179 
180  // add it
181  pm->touchents[pm->numtouch] = entityNum;
182  pm->numtouch++;
183 }

190 {

225 void PM_ClipVelocity(vec3_t in, vec3_t normal, vec3_t out, float overbounce)
226 {
227  float backoff = DotProduct(in, normal);
228 
229  if (backoff < 0)
230  {
231  backoff *= overbounce;
232  }
233  else
234  {
235  backoff /= overbounce;
236  }
237 
238  out[0] = in[0] - (normal[0] * backoff);
239  out[1] = in[1] - (normal[1] * backoff);
240  out[2] = in[2] - (normal[2] * backoff);
241 }

257 void PM_TraceLegs(trace_t *trace, float *legsOffset, vec3_t start, vec3_t end, trace_t *bodytrace, vec3_t viewangles, void (tracefunc) (trace_t *results, const vec3_t start, const vec3_t mins, const vec3_t maxs, const vec3_t end, int passEntityNum, int contentMask), int ignoreent, int tracemask)
258 {
259  vec3_t ofs, org, point;
260  vec3_t flatforward;
261  float angle;
262 
263  // zinx - don't let players block legs
264  tracemask &= ~(CONTENTS_BODY | CONTENTS_CORPSE);
265 
266  if (legsOffset)
267  {
268  *legsOffset = 0;
269  }
270 
271  angle = DEG2RAD(viewangles[YAW]);
272  flatforward[0] = cos(angle);
273  flatforward[1] = sin(angle);
274  flatforward[2] = 0;
275 
276  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
277  {
278  VectorScale(flatforward, -32, ofs);
279  }
280  else
281  {
282  VectorScale(flatforward, 32, ofs);
283  }
284 
285  VectorAdd(start, ofs, org);
286  VectorAdd(end, ofs, point);
287  tracefunc(trace, org, playerlegsProneMins, playerlegsProneMaxs, point, ignoreent, tracemask);
288  if (!bodytrace || trace->fraction < bodytrace->fraction ||
289  trace->allsolid)
290  {
291  trace_t steptrace;
292 
293  // legs are clipping sooner than body
294  // see if our legs can step up
295 
296  // give it a try with the new height
297  ofs[2] += STEPSIZE;
298 
299  VectorAdd(start, ofs, org);
300  VectorAdd(end, ofs, point);
301  tracefunc(&steptrace, org, playerlegsProneMins, playerlegsProneMaxs, point, ignoreent, tracemask);
302  if (!steptrace.allsolid && !steptrace.startsolid &&
303  steptrace.fraction > trace->fraction)
304  {
305  // the step trace did better -- use it instead
306  *trace = steptrace;
307 
308  // get legs offset
309  if (legsOffset)
310  {
311  *legsOffset = ofs[2];
312 
313  VectorCopy(steptrace.endpos, org);
314  VectorCopy(steptrace.endpos, point);
315  point[2] -= STEPSIZE;
316 
317  tracefunc(&steptrace, org, playerlegsProneMins, playerlegsProneMaxs, point, ignoreent, tracemask);
318  if (!steptrace.allsolid)
319  {
320  *legsOffset = ofs[2] - (org[2] - steptrace.endpos[2]);
321  }
322  }
323  }
324  }
325 }

337 void PM_TraceHead(trace_t *trace, vec3_t start, vec3_t end, trace_t *bodytrace, vec3_t viewangles,
338  void (tracefunc) (trace_t *results,
339  const vec3_t start,
340  const vec3_t mins,
341  const vec3_t maxs,
342  const vec3_t end,
343  int passEntityNum,
344  int contentMask),
345  int ignoreent,
346  int tracemask)
347 {
348  vec3_t ofs;
349  vec3_t flatforward;
350  vec3_t point;
351  float angle;
352  // more than just head, try to make a box for all the
353  // player model that extends out (weapons and arms too)
354  vec3_t mins = { -18.f, -18.f, -2.f };
355  vec3_t maxs = { 18.f, 18.f, 10.f };
356 
357  // don't let players block head
358  tracemask &= ~(CONTENTS_BODY | CONTENTS_CORPSE);
359 
360  angle = DEG2RAD(viewangles[YAW]);
361  flatforward[0] = cos(angle);
362  flatforward[1] = sin(angle);
363  flatforward[2] = 0;
364 
365  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
366  {
367  VectorScale(flatforward, 36, ofs);
368  }
369  else
370  {
371  VectorScale(flatforward, -36, ofs);
372  }
373 
374  VectorAdd(end, ofs, point);
375  tracefunc(trace, start, mins, maxs, point, ignoreent, tracemask);
376 }

385 void PM_TraceAllParts(trace_t *trace, float *legsOffset, vec3_t start, vec3_t end)
386 {
387  pm->trace(trace, start, pm->mins, pm->maxs, end, pm->ps->clientNum, pm->tracemask);
388 
389  // legs and head
390  if ((pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE) ||
391  (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_DEAD))
392  {
393 
394  trace_t legtrace;
395  trace_t headtrace;
396  qboolean adjust = qfalse;
397 
398  PM_TraceLegs(&legtrace, legsOffset, start, end, trace,
399  pm->ps->viewangles, pm->trace, pm->ps->clientNum,
400  pm->tracemask);
401 
402  if (legtrace.fraction < trace->fraction ||
403  legtrace.startsolid ||
404  legtrace.allsolid)
405  {
406 
407  *trace = legtrace;
408  adjust = qtrue;
409  }
410 
411  PM_TraceHead(&headtrace, start, end, trace,
412  pm->ps->viewangles, pm->trace, pm->ps->clientNum,
413  pm->tracemask);
414 
415  if (headtrace.fraction < trace->fraction ||
416  headtrace.startsolid ||
417  headtrace.allsolid)
418  {
419 
420  *trace = headtrace;
421  adjust = qtrue;
422  }
423 
424  if (adjust)
425  {
426  VectorSubtract(end, start, trace->endpos);
427  VectorMA(start, trace->fraction, trace->endpos,
428  trace->endpos);
429  }
430  }
431 }

447 static void PM_Friction(void)
448 {
449  vec3_t vec;
450  float speed, newspeed;
451  float drop;
452  float *vel = pm->ps->velocity;
453 
454  VectorCopy(vel, vec);
455  if (pml.walking)
456  {
457  vec[2] = 0; // ignore slope movement
458  }
459 
460  speed = VectorLength(vec);
461  // don't do this for PM_SPECTATOR/PM_NOCLIP, we always want them to stop
462  if (speed < 1 && pm->ps->pm_type != PM_SPECTATOR && pm->ps->pm_type != PM_NOCLIP)
463  {
464  vel[0] = 0;
465  vel[1] = 0; // allow sinking underwater
466  // FIXME: still have z friction underwater?
467  return;
468  }
469 
470  drop = 0;
471 
472  // apply ground friction
473  if (pm->waterlevel <= 1)
474  {
475  if (pml.walking && !(pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags & SURF_SLICK))
476  {
477  // if getting knocked back, no friction
478  if (!(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_TIME_KNOCKBACK))
479  {
480  float control = speed < pm_stopspeed ? pm_stopspeed : speed;
481 
482  drop += control * pm_friction * pml.frametime;
483  }
484  }
485  }
486 
487  // apply water friction even if just wading
488  if (pm->waterlevel)
489  {
490  if (pm->watertype & CONTENTS_SLIME) // slag
491  {
492  drop += speed * pm_slagfriction * pm->waterlevel * pml.frametime;
493  }
494  else
495  {
496  drop += speed * pm_waterfriction * pm->waterlevel * pml.frametime;
497  }
498  }
499 
500  if (pm->ps->pm_type == PM_SPECTATOR)
501  {
502  drop += speed * pm_spectatorfriction * pml.frametime;
503  }
504 
505  // apply ladder strafe friction
506  if (pml.ladder)
507  {
508  drop += speed * pm_ladderfriction * pml.frametime;
509  }
510 
511  // scale the velocity
512  newspeed = speed - drop;
513  if (newspeed < 0)
514  {
515  newspeed = 0;
516  }
517  newspeed /= speed;
518 
519  // if we're barely moving and barely slowing down, we want to
520  // help things along--we don't want to end up getting snapped back to
521  // our previous speed
522  if (pm->ps->pm_type == PM_SPECTATOR || pm->ps->pm_type == PM_NOCLIP)
523  {
524  if (drop < 1.0f && speed < 3.0f)
525  {
526  newspeed = 0.0;
527  }
528  }
529 
530  // used VectorScale instead of multiplying by hand
531  VectorScale(vel, newspeed, vel);
532 }
533 
540 static void PM_Accelerate(vec3_t wishdir, float wishspeed, float accel)
541 {
542  // q2 style
543  int i;
544  float addspeed, accelspeed, currentspeed;
545 
546  currentspeed = DotProduct(pm->ps->velocity, wishdir);
547  addspeed = wishspeed - currentspeed;
548  if (addspeed <= 0)
549  {
550  return;
551  }
552  accelspeed = accel * pml.frametime * wishspeed;
553  if (accelspeed > addspeed)
554  {
555  accelspeed = addspeed;
556  }
557 
558  // variable friction for AI's
559  if (pm->ps->groundEntityNum != ENTITYNUM_NONE)
560  {
561  accelspeed *= (1.0f / pm->ps->friction);
562  }
563  if (accelspeed > addspeed)
564  {
565  accelspeed = addspeed;
566  }
567 
568  for (i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++)
569  {
570  pm->ps->velocity[i] += accelspeed * wishdir[i];
571  }
572 }
573 
580 static float PM_CmdScale(usercmd_t *cmd)
581 {
582  int max;
583  float total;
584  float scale;
585 
586  max = abs(cmd->forwardmove);
587  if (abs(cmd->rightmove) > max)
588  {
589  max = abs(cmd->rightmove);
590  }
591  if (abs(cmd->upmove) > max)
592  {
593  max = abs(cmd->upmove);
594  }
595  if (!max)
596  {
597  return 0;
598  }
599 
600  total = sqrt(cmd->forwardmove * cmd->forwardmove
601  + cmd->rightmove * cmd->rightmove + cmd->upmove * cmd->upmove);
602  scale = (float)pm->ps->speed * max / (127.0f * total);
603 
604  if ((pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_SPRINT) && pm->pmext->sprintTime > 50)
605  {
606  scale *= pm->ps->sprintSpeedScale;
607  }
608  else
609  {
610  scale *= pm->ps->runSpeedScale;
611  }
612 
613  if (pm->ps->pm_type == PM_NOCLIP)
614  {
615  scale *= 3;
616  }
617 
618  // half move speed if heavy weapon is carried
619  // this is the counterstrike way of doing it -- ie you can switch to a non-heavy weapon and move at
620  // full speed. not completely realistic (well, sure, you can run faster with the weapon strapped to your
621  // back than in carry position) but more fun to play. If it doesn't play well this way we'll bog down the
622  // player if the own the weapon at all.
623  if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->skillBased == SK_HEAVY_WEAPONS && !CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
624  {
625  if (pm->ps->weapon == WP_FLAMETHROWER) // trying some different balance for the FT
626  {
627  if (!(pm->skill[SK_HEAVY_WEAPONS] >= 3) || (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK))
628  {
629  scale *= 0.7f;
630  }
631  }
632  else
633  {
634  if (pm->skill[SK_HEAVY_WEAPONS] >= 3)
635  {
636  scale *= 0.75f;
637  }
638  else
639  {
640  scale *= 0.5f;
641  }
642  }
643  }
644 
645  return scale;
646 }
647 
652 static void PM_SetMovementDir(void)
653 {
654  // changed - for more realistic angles (at the cost of more network traffic?)
655  float speed;
656  vec3_t moved;
657 
658  VectorSubtract(pm->ps->origin, pml.previous_origin, moved);
659 
660  if ((pm->cmd.forwardmove || pm->cmd.rightmove)
661  && (pm->ps->groundEntityNum != ENTITYNUM_NONE)
662  && (speed = VectorLength(moved)) != 0.f
663  && (speed > pml.frametime * 5)) // if moving slower than 20 units per second, just face head angles
664  {
665  vec3_t dir;
666  int moveyaw;
667 
668  VectorNormalize2(moved, dir);
669  vectoangles(dir, dir);
670 
671  moveyaw = (int)(AngleDelta(dir[YAW], pm->ps->viewangles[YAW]));
672 
673  if (pm->cmd.forwardmove < 0)
674  {
675  moveyaw = (int)(AngleNormalize180(moveyaw + 180));
676  }
677 
678  if (abs(moveyaw) > 75)
679  {
680  if (moveyaw > 0)
681  {
682  moveyaw = 75;
683  }
684  else
685  {
686  moveyaw = -75;
687  }
688  }
689 
690  pm->ps->movementDir = (signed char)moveyaw;
691  }
692  else
693  {
694  pm->ps->movementDir = 0;
695  }
696 }

702 static qboolean PM_CheckJump(void)
703 {
704  // no jumpin when prone
705  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
706  {
707  return qfalse;
708  }
709 
710  // jumping in multiplayer uses and requires sprint juice (to prevent turbo skating, sprint + jumps)
711  // don't allow jump accel
712 
713  // revert to using pmext for this since pmext is fixed now.
714  if (pm->cmd.serverTime - pm->pmext->jumpTime < 850)
715  {
716  return qfalse;
717  }
718 
719  // don't allow if player tired
720  //if (pm->pmext->sprintTime < 2500) // JPW pulled this per id request; made airborne jumpers wildly inaccurate with gunfire to compensate
721  // return qfalse;
722 
723 
724  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_RESPAWNED)
725  {
726  return qfalse; // don't allow jump until all buttons are up
727  }
728 
729  if (pm->cmd.upmove < 10)
730  {
731  // not holding jump
732  return qfalse;
733  }
734 
735  // must wait for jump to be released
736  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_JUMP_HELD)
737  {
738  // clear upmove so cmdscale doesn't lower running speed
739  pm->cmd.upmove = 0;
740  return qfalse;
741  }
742 
743  pml.groundPlane = qfalse; // jumping away
744  pml.walking = qfalse;
745  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_JUMP_HELD;
746 
747  pm->ps->groundEntityNum = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
748  pm->ps->velocity[2] = JUMP_VELOCITY;
749 
750  if (pm->cmd.forwardmove >= 0)
751  {
752  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_JUMP, qfalse, qtrue);
753  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP;
754  }
755  else
756  {
757  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_JUMPBK, qfalse, qtrue);
758  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP;
759  }
760 
761  return qtrue;
762 }
763 
768 static qboolean PM_CheckWaterJump(void)
769 {
770  vec3_t spot;
771  int cont;
772  vec3_t flatforward;
773 
774  if (pm->ps->pm_time)
775  {
776  return qfalse;
777  }
778 
779  // check for water jump
780  if (pm->waterlevel != 2)
781  {
782  return qfalse;
783  }
784 
785  flatforward[0] = pml.forward[0];
786  flatforward[1] = pml.forward[1];
787  flatforward[2] = 0;
788  VectorNormalize(flatforward);
789 
790  VectorMA(pm->ps->origin, 30, flatforward, spot);
791  spot[2] += 4;
792  cont = pm->pointcontents(spot, pm->ps->clientNum);
793  if (!(cont & CONTENTS_SOLID))
794  {
795  return qfalse;
796  }
797 
798  spot[2] += 16;
799  cont = pm->pointcontents(spot, pm->ps->clientNum);
800  if (cont)
801  {
802  return qfalse;
803  }
804 
805  // jump out of water
806  VectorScale(pml.forward, 200, pm->ps->velocity);
807  pm->ps->velocity[2] = 350;
808 
809  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_TIME_WATERJUMP;
810  pm->ps->pm_time = 2000;
811 
812  return qtrue;
813 }
814 
819 static qboolean PM_CheckProne(void)
820 {
821  //Com_Printf( "%i: PM_CheckProne\n", pm->cmd.serverTime);
822  int pronedelay = 750;
823 
824  if (PM_PRONEDELAY)
825  {
826  pronedelay = 1750;
827  }
828 
829  if (!(pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE))
830  {
831  // can't go prone on ladders
832  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_LADDER)
833  {
834  return qfalse;
835  }
836 
837  // no prone when player is mounted
838  if (BG_PlayerMounted(pm->ps->eFlags))
839  {
840  return qfalse;
841  }
842 
843  if (pm->ps->weaponDelay && (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PANZER))
844  {
845  return qfalse;
846  }
847 
848  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
849  {
850  return qfalse;
851  }
852 
853  // can't go prone while swimming
854  if (pm->waterlevel > 1)
855  {
856  return qfalse;
857  }
858 
859  if ((((pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_DUCKED) && pm->cmd.doubleTap == DT_FORWARD) ||
860  (pm->cmd.wbuttons & WBUTTON_PRONE)) && pm->cmd.serverTime - -pm->pmext->proneTime > pronedelay)
861  {
862  trace_t trace;
863 
864  pm->mins[0] = pm->ps->mins[0];
865  pm->mins[1] = pm->ps->mins[1];
866 
867  pm->maxs[0] = pm->ps->maxs[0];
868  pm->maxs[1] = pm->ps->maxs[1];
869 
870  pm->mins[2] = pm->ps->mins[2];
871  pm->maxs[2] = pm->ps->crouchMaxZ;
872 
873  pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_PRONE;
874  PM_TraceAll(&trace, pm->ps->origin, pm->ps->origin);
875  pm->ps->eFlags &= ~EF_PRONE;
876 
877  if (PM_PRONEDELAY)
878  {
879  pm->ps->aimSpreadScale = AIMSPREAD_MAXSPREAD;
880  pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat = AIMSPREAD_MAXSPREAD;
881  }
882 
883  if (trace.fraction == 1.0f)
884  {
885  // go prone
886  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_DUCKED; // crouched as well
887  pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_PRONE;
888  pm->pmext->proneTime = pm->cmd.serverTime; // timestamp 'go prone'
889  }
890  }
891  }
892 
893  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
894  {
895  if (pm->waterlevel > 1 ||
896  pm->ps->pm_type == PM_DEAD ||
897  BG_PlayerMounted(pm->ps->eFlags) ||
898  ((pm->cmd.doubleTap == DT_BACK || pm->cmd.upmove > 10 || (pm->cmd.wbuttons & WBUTTON_PRONE)) && pm->cmd.serverTime - pm->pmext->proneTime > pronedelay))
899  {
900  trace_t trace;
901 
902  // see if we have the space to stop prone
903  pm->mins[0] = pm->ps->mins[0];
904  pm->mins[1] = pm->ps->mins[1];
905 
906  pm->maxs[0] = pm->ps->maxs[0];
907  pm->maxs[1] = pm->ps->maxs[1];
908 
909  pm->mins[2] = pm->ps->mins[2];
910  pm->maxs[2] = pm->ps->crouchMaxZ;
911 
912  pm->ps->eFlags &= ~EF_PRONE;
913  PM_TraceAll(&trace, pm->ps->origin, pm->ps->origin);
914  pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_PRONE;
915 
916  if (trace.fraction == 1.0f)
917  {
918  // crouch for a bit
919  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_DUCKED;
920 
921  // stop prone
922  pm->ps->eFlags &= ~EF_PRONE;
923  pm->ps->eFlags &= ~EF_PRONE_MOVING;
924  pm->pmext->proneTime = -pm->cmd.serverTime; // timestamp 'stop prone'
925 
926  // don't let them keep scope out when
927  // standing from prone or they will
928  // look right through a wall
929  if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type & (WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
930  {
931  PM_BeginWeaponChange((weapon_t)pm->ps->weapon, GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->weapAlts, qfalse);
932  }
933 
934  // don't jump for a bit
935  pm->pmext->jumpTime = pm->cmd.serverTime - 650;
936  pm->ps->jumpTime = pm->cmd.serverTime - 650;
937  }
938  }
939  }
940 
941  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
942  {
943  // See if we are moving
944  float spd = VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity);
945  qboolean userinput = abs(pm->cmd.forwardmove) + abs(pm->cmd.rightmove) > 10 ? qtrue : qfalse;
946 
947  if (userinput && spd > 40.f && !(pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE_MOVING))
948  {
949  pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_PRONE_MOVING;
950  }
951  else if (!userinput && spd < 20.0f && (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE_MOVING))
952  {
953  pm->ps->eFlags &= ~EF_PRONE_MOVING;
954  }
955 
956  pm->mins[0] = pm->ps->mins[0];
957  pm->mins[1] = pm->ps->mins[1];
958 
959  pm->maxs[0] = pm->ps->maxs[0];
960  pm->maxs[1] = pm->ps->maxs[1];
961 
962  pm->mins[2] = pm->ps->mins[2];
963 
964  // it appears that 12 is the magic number
965  // for the minimum maxs[2] that prevents
966  // player from getting stuck into the world.
967  pm->maxs[2] = 12;
968  pm->ps->viewheight = PRONE_VIEWHEIGHT;
969 
970  return qtrue;
971  }
972 
973  return qfalse;
974 }

981 static void PM_WaterJumpMove(void)
982 {
983  // waterjump has no control, but falls
984 
985  PM_StepSlideMove(qtrue);
986 
987  pm->ps->velocity[2] -= pm->ps->gravity * pml.frametime;
988  if (pm->ps->velocity[2] < 0)
989  {
990  // cancel as soon as we are falling down again
991  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_ALL_TIMES;
992  pm->ps->pm_time = 0;
993  }
994 }
995 
999 static void PM_WaterMove(void)
1000 {
1001  vec3_t wishvel;
1002  float wishspeed;
1003  vec3_t wishdir;
1004  float scale;
1005 
1006  if (PM_CheckWaterJump())
1007  {
1008  PM_WaterJumpMove();
1009  return;
1010  }
1011 
1012  PM_Friction();
1013 
1014  scale = PM_CmdScale(&pm->cmd);
1015 
1016  // user intentions
1017 
1018  if (scale == 0.f)
1019  {
1020  wishvel[0] = 0;
1021  wishvel[1] = 0;
1022  wishvel[2] = -60; // sink towards bottom
1023  }
1024  else
1025  {
1026  int i;
1027 
1028  for (i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++)
1029  {
1030  wishvel[i] = scale * pml.forward[i] * pm->cmd.forwardmove + scale * pml.right[i] * pm->cmd.rightmove;
1031  }
1032  wishvel[2] += scale * pm->cmd.upmove;
1033  }
1034 
1035  VectorCopy(wishvel, wishdir);
1036  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1037 
1038  if (pm->watertype & CONTENTS_SLIME) // slag
1039  {
1040  if (wishspeed > pm->ps->speed * pm_slagSwimScale)
1041  {
1042  wishspeed = pm->ps->speed * pm_slagSwimScale;
1043  }
1044 
1045  PM_Accelerate(wishdir, wishspeed, pm_slagaccelerate);
1046  }
1047  else
1048  {
1049  if (wishspeed > pm->ps->speed * pm_waterSwimScale)
1050  {
1051  wishspeed = pm->ps->speed * pm_waterSwimScale;
1052  }
1053 
1054  PM_Accelerate(wishdir, wishspeed, pm_wateraccelerate);
1055  }
1056 
1057  // make sure we can go up slopes easily under water
1058  if (pml.groundPlane && DotProduct(pm->ps->velocity, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal) < 0)
1059  {
1060  float vel = VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity);
1061 
1062  // slide along the ground plane
1063  PM_ClipVelocity(pm->ps->velocity, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal,
1064  pm->ps->velocity, OVERCLIP);
1065 
1066  VectorNormalize(pm->ps->velocity);
1067  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity, vel, pm->ps->velocity);
1068  }
1069 
1070  PM_SlideMove(qfalse);
1071 }
1072 
1076 static void PM_FlyMove(void)
1077 {
1078  vec3_t wishvel;
1079  float wishspeed;
1080  vec3_t wishdir;
1081  float scale;
1082 
1083  // normal slowdown
1084  PM_Friction();
1085 
1086  scale = PM_CmdScale(&pm->cmd);
1087 
1088  // spectator boost
1089  if (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_SPRINT)
1090  {
1091  scale *= 2;
1092  }
1093 
1094  // user intentions
1095  if (scale == 0.f)
1096  {
1097  wishvel[0] = 0;
1098  wishvel[1] = 0;
1099  wishvel[2] = 0;
1100  }
1101  else
1102  {
1103  int i;
1104 
1105  for (i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++)
1106  {
1107  wishvel[i] = scale * pml.forward[i] * pm->cmd.forwardmove + scale * pml.right[i] * pm->cmd.rightmove;
1108  }
1109 
1110  wishvel[2] += scale * pm->cmd.upmove;
1111  }
1112 
1113  VectorCopy(wishvel, wishdir);
1114  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1115 
1116  PM_Accelerate(wishdir, wishspeed, pm_flyaccelerate);
1117 
1118  PM_StepSlideMove(qfalse);
1119 }
1120 
1124 static void PM_AirMove(void)
1125 {
1126  vec3_t wishvel;
1127  float fmove, smove;
1128  vec3_t wishdir;
1129  float wishspeed;
1130  float scale;
1131  usercmd_t cmd;
1132 
1133  PM_Friction();
1134 
1135  fmove = pm->cmd.forwardmove;
1136  smove = pm->cmd.rightmove;
1137 
1138  cmd = pm->cmd;
1139  scale = PM_CmdScale(&cmd);
1140 
1141  pml.forward[2] = 0;
1142  pml.right[2] = 0;
1143 
1144  VectorNormalize(pml.forward);
1145  VectorNormalize(pml.right);
1146 
1147  wishvel[0] = pml.forward[0] * fmove + pml.right[0] * smove;
1148  wishvel[1] = pml.forward[1] * fmove + pml.right[1] * smove;
1149 
1150  wishvel[2] = 0;
1151 
1152  VectorCopy(wishvel, wishdir);
1153  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1154  wishspeed *= scale;
1155 
1156  // not on ground, so little effect on velocity
1157  PM_Accelerate(wishdir, wishspeed, pm_airaccelerate);
1158 
1159  // we may have a ground plane that is very steep, even
1160  // though we don't have a groundentity slide along the steep plane
1161  if (pml.groundPlane)
1162  {
1163  PM_ClipVelocity(pm->ps->velocity, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal,
1164  pm->ps->velocity, OVERCLIP);
1165  }
1166 
1167  PM_StepSlideMove(qtrue);
1168 
1169  // moved this down, so we use the actual movement direction
1170  // set the movementDir so clients can rotate the legs for strafing
1171  PM_SetMovementDir();
1172 }
1173 
1177 static void PM_WalkMove(void)
1178 {
1179  int i;
1180  vec3_t wishvel;
1181  float fmove, smove;
1182  vec3_t wishdir;
1183  float wishspeed;
1184  float scale;
1185  usercmd_t cmd;
1186  float accelerate;
1187  float vel;
1188 
1189  if (pm->waterlevel > 2 && DotProduct(pml.forward, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal) > 0)
1190  {
1191  // begin swimming
1192  PM_WaterMove();
1193  return;
1194  }
1195 
1196  if (PM_CheckJump())
1197  {
1198  // jumped away
1199  if (pm->waterlevel > 1)
1200  {
1201  PM_WaterMove();
1202  }
1203  else
1204  {
1205  PM_AirMove();
1206  }
1207 
1208  if (!(pm->cmd.serverTime - pm->pmext->jumpTime < 850))
1209  {
1210  pm->pmext->sprintTime -= 2500;
1211  if (pm->pmext->sprintTime < 0)
1212  {
1213  pm->pmext->sprintTime = 0;
1214  }
1215 
1216  pm->pmext->jumpTime = pm->cmd.serverTime;
1217  }
1218 
1219  pm->ps->jumpTime = pm->cmd.serverTime;
1220 
1221  return;
1222  }
1223 
1224  PM_Friction();
1225 
1226  fmove = pm->cmd.forwardmove;
1227  smove = pm->cmd.rightmove;
1228 
1229  cmd = pm->cmd;
1230  scale = PM_CmdScale(&cmd);
1231 
1232  // project moves down to flat plane
1233  pml.forward[2] = 0;
1234  pml.right[2] = 0;
1235 
1236  // project the forward and right directions onto the ground plane
1237  PM_ClipVelocity(pml.forward, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal, pml.forward, OVERCLIP);
1238  PM_ClipVelocity(pml.right, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal, pml.right, OVERCLIP);
1239  //
1240  VectorNormalize(pml.forward);
1241  VectorNormalize(pml.right);
1242 
1243  for (i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++)
1244  {
1245  wishvel[i] = pml.forward[i] * fmove + pml.right[i] * smove;
1246  }
1247  // when going up or down slopes the wish velocity should Not be zero
1248  //wishvel[2] = 0;
1249 
1250  VectorCopy(wishvel, wishdir);
1251  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1252  wishspeed *= scale;
1253 
1254  // clamp the speed lower if prone
1255  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
1256  {
1257  if (wishspeed > pm->ps->speed * pm_proneSpeedScale)
1258  {
1259  // cap the max prone speed while reloading and mouting/unmouting alt weapon
1260  if (pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_RELOADING ||
1261  (pm->ps->weapAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT) == WEAP_ALTSWITCHFROM ||
1262  (pm->ps->weapAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT) == WEAP_ALTSWITCHTO)
1263  {
1264  wishspeed = (wishspeed < 40.f) ? pm->ps->speed * pm_proneSpeedScale : 40.f;
1265  }
1266  else
1267  {
1268  wishspeed = pm->ps->speed * pm_proneSpeedScale;
1269  }
1270  }
1271  }
1272  else if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_DUCKED) // clamp the speed lower if ducking
1273  {
1274  if (wishspeed > pm->ps->speed * pm->ps->crouchSpeedScale)
1275  {
1276  wishspeed = pm->ps->speed * pm->ps->crouchSpeedScale;
1277  }
1278  }
1279 
1280  // clamp the speed lower if wading or walking on the bottom
1281  if (pm->waterlevel)
1282  {
1283  float waterScale;
1284 
1285  waterScale = pm->waterlevel / 3.0f;
1286  if (pm->watertype & CONTENTS_SLIME) // slag cont
1287  {
1288  waterScale = 1.0f - (1.0f - pm_slagSwimScale) * waterScale;
1289  }
1290  else
1291  {
1292  waterScale = 1.0f - (1.0f - pm_waterSwimScale) * waterScale;
1293  }
1294 
1295  if (wishspeed > pm->ps->speed * waterScale)
1296  {
1297  wishspeed = pm->ps->speed * waterScale;
1298  }
1299  }
1300 
1301  // when a player gets hit, they temporarily lose
1302  // full control, which allows them to be moved a bit
1303  if ((pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags & SURF_SLICK) || (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_TIME_KNOCKBACK))
1304  {
1305  accelerate = pm_airaccelerate;
1306  }
1307  else
1308  {
1309  accelerate = pm_accelerate;
1310  }
1311 
1312  PM_Accelerate(wishdir, wishspeed, accelerate);
1313 
1314  //Com_Printf("velocity = %1.1f %1.1f %1.1f\n", pm->ps->velocity[0], pm->ps->velocity[1], pm->ps->velocity[2]);
1315  //Com_Printf("velocity1 = %1.1f\n", VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity));
1316 
1317  if ((pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags & SURF_SLICK) || (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_TIME_KNOCKBACK))
1318  {
1319  pm->ps->velocity[2] -= pm->ps->gravity * pml.frametime;
1320  }
1321 
1322  // show breath when standing on 'snow' surfaces
1323  if (pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags & SURF_SNOW)
1324  {
1325  pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_BREATH;
1326  }
1327  else
1328  {
1329  pm->ps->eFlags &= ~EF_BREATH;
1330  }
1331 
1332  vel = VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity);
1333 
1334  // slide along the ground plane
1335  PM_ClipVelocity(pm->ps->velocity, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal, pm->ps->velocity, OVERCLIP);
1336 
1337  // don't do anything if standing still
1338  if (pm->ps->velocity[0] == 0.f && pm->ps->velocity[1] == 0.f)
1339  {
1340  return;
1341  }
1342 
1343  // don't decrease velocity when going up or down a slope
1344  VectorNormalize(pm->ps->velocity);
1345  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity, vel, pm->ps->velocity);
1346 
1347  PM_StepSlideMove(qfalse);
1348 
1349  // moved this down, so we use the actual movement direction
1350  // set the movementDir so clients can rotate the legs for strafing
1351  PM_SetMovementDir();
1352 }
1353 
1357 static void PM_DeadMove(void)
1358 {
1359  float forward;
1360 
1361  if (!pml.walking)
1362  {
1363  return;
1364  }
1365 
1366  // extra friction
1367  forward = VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity);
1368  forward -= 20;
1369  if (forward <= 0)
1370  {
1371  VectorClear(pm->ps->velocity);
1372  }
1373  else
1374  {
1375  VectorNormalize(pm->ps->velocity);
1376  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity, forward, pm->ps->velocity);
1377  }
1378 }
1379 
1383 static void PM_NoclipMove(void)
1384 {
1385  float speed;
1386  int i;
1387  vec3_t wishvel;
1388  float fmove, smove;
1389  vec3_t wishdir;
1390  float wishspeed;
1391  float scale;
1392 
1393  pm->ps->viewheight = DEFAULT_VIEWHEIGHT;
1394 
1395  // friction
1396  speed = VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity);
1397  if (speed < 1)
1398  {
1399  VectorCopy(vec3_origin, pm->ps->velocity);
1400  }
1401  else
1402  {
1403  float drop = 0;
1404  float friction = pm_friction * 1.5f; // extra friction
1405  float control = speed < pm_stopspeed ? pm_stopspeed : speed;
1406  float newspeed;
1407 
1408  drop += control * friction * pml.frametime;
1409 
1410  // scale the velocity
1411  newspeed = speed - drop;
1412  if (newspeed < 0)
1413  {
1414  newspeed = 0;
1415  }
1416  newspeed /= speed;
1417 
1418  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity, newspeed, pm->ps->velocity);
1419  }
1420 
1421  // accelerate
1422  scale = PM_CmdScale(&pm->cmd);
1423 
1424  fmove = pm->cmd.forwardmove;
1425  smove = pm->cmd.rightmove;
1426 
1427  for (i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++)
1428  {
1429  wishvel[i] = pml.forward[i] * fmove + pml.right[i] * smove;
1430  }
1431  wishvel[2] += pm->cmd.upmove;
1432 
1433  VectorCopy(wishvel, wishdir);
1434  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1435  wishspeed *= scale;
1436 
1437  PM_Accelerate(wishdir, wishspeed, pm_accelerate);
1438 
1439  // move
1440  VectorMA(pm->ps->origin, pml.frametime, pm->ps->velocity, pm->ps->origin);
1441 }

1449 static int PM_FootstepForSurface(void)
1450 {
1451 #ifdef GAMEDLL
1452  // In just the GAME DLL, we want to store the groundtrace surface stuff,
1453  // so we don't have to keep tracing.
1454  ClientStoreSurfaceFlags(pm->ps->clientNum, pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags);
1455 #endif // GAMEDLL
1456 
1457  return BG_FootstepForSurface(pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags);
1458 }
1459 
1463 static void PM_CrashLand(void)
1464 {
1465  float delta;
1466  float dist;
1467  float vel, acc;
1468  float t;
1469  float a, b, c, den;
1470 
1471  // Ridah, only play this if coming down hard
1472  if (!pm->ps->legsTimer)
1473  {
1474  if (pml.previous_velocity[2] < -220)
1475  {
1476  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_LAND, qfalse, qtrue);
1477  }
1478  }
1479 
1480  // calculate the exact velocity on landing
1481  dist = pm->ps->origin[2] - pml.previous_origin[2];
1482  vel = pml.previous_velocity[2];
1483  acc = -pm->ps->gravity;
1484 
1485  a = acc / 2;
1486  b = vel;
1487  c = -dist;
1488 
1489  den = b * b - 4 * a * c;
1490  if (den < 0)
1491  {
1492  return;
1493  }
1494  t = (-b - (float)sqrt(den)) / (2 * a);
1495 
1496  delta = vel + t * acc;
1497  delta = delta * delta * 0.0001f;
1498 
1499  // never take falling damage if completely underwater
1500  if (pm->waterlevel == 3)
1501  {
1502 #ifdef GAMEDLL // nothing to predict
1503  pm->pmext->shoved = qfalse;
1504 #endif
1505  return;
1506  }
1507 
1508  // reduce falling damage if there is standing water
1509  if (pm->waterlevel == 2)
1510  {
1511  delta *= 0.25;
1512  }
1513  if (pm->waterlevel == 1)
1514  {
1515  delta *= 0.5;
1516  }
1517 
1518  if (delta < 1)
1519  {
1520  return;
1521  }
1522 
1523  // create a local entity event to play the sound
1524 
1525  // SURF_NODAMAGE is used for bounce pads where you don't ever
1526  // want to take damage or play a crunch sound
1527  if (!(pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags & SURF_NODAMAGE) && !pm->predict)
1528  {
1529  if (pm->debugLevel)
1530  {
1531  Com_Printf("delta: %5.2f\n", (double)delta);
1532  }
1533 
1534  if (delta > 77)
1535  {
1536  PM_AddEventExt(EV_FALL_NDIE, PM_FootstepForSurface());
1537  }
1538  else if (delta > 67)
1539  {
1540  // this is a pain grunt, so don't play it if dead
1541  if (pm->ps->stats[STAT_HEALTH] > 0)
1542  {
1543  PM_AddEventExt(EV_FALL_DMG_50, PM_FootstepForSurface());
1544  //BG_UpdateConditionValue(pm->ps->clientNum, ANIM_COND_IMPACT_POINT, (rand() + 1) ? IMPACTPOINT_KNEE_RIGHT : IMPACTPOINT_KNEE_LEFT, qtrue);
1545  //BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_PAIN, qfalse, qtrue);
1546  }
1547  }
1548  else if (delta > 58)
1549  {
1550  // this is a pain grunt, so don't play it if dead
1551  if (pm->ps->stats[STAT_HEALTH] > 0)
1552  {
1553  PM_AddEventExt(EV_FALL_DMG_25, PM_FootstepForSurface());
1554  //BG_UpdateConditionValue(pm->ps->clientNum, ANIM_COND_IMPACT_POINT, (rand() + 1) ? IMPACTPOINT_KNEE_RIGHT : IMPACTPOINT_KNEE_LEFT, qtrue);
1555  //BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_PAIN, qfalse, qtrue);
1556  }
1557  }
1558  else if (delta > 48)
1559  {
1560  // this is a pain grunt, so don't play it if dead
1561  if (pm->ps->stats[STAT_HEALTH] > 0)
1562  {
1563  PM_AddEventExt(EV_FALL_DMG_15, PM_FootstepForSurface());
1564  //BG_UpdateConditionValue(pm->ps->clientNum, ANIM_COND_IMPACT_POINT, (rand() + 1) ? IMPACTPOINT_KNEE_RIGHT : IMPACTPOINT_KNEE_LEFT, qtrue);
1565  //BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_PAIN, qfalse, qtrue);
1566  }
1567  }
1568  else if (delta > 38.75f)
1569  {
1570  // this is a pain grunt, so don't play it if dead
1571  if (pm->ps->stats[STAT_HEALTH] > 0)
1572  {
1573  PM_AddEventExt(EV_FALL_DMG_10, PM_FootstepForSurface());
1574  //BG_UpdateConditionValue(pm->ps->clientNum, ANIM_COND_IMPACT_POINT, (rand() + 1) ? IMPACTPOINT_KNEE_RIGHT : IMPACTPOINT_KNEE_LEFT, qtrue);
1575  //BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_PAIN, qfalse, qtrue);
1576  }
1577  }
1578  else if (delta > 7)
1579  {
1580  PM_AddEventExt(EV_FALL_SHORT, PM_FootstepForSurface());
1581  }
1582  else
1583  {
1584  PM_AddEventExt(EV_FOOTSTEP, PM_FootstepForSurface());
1585  }
1586  }
1587 
1588  // when falling damage happens, velocity is cleared, but
1589  // this needs to happen in pmove, not g_active! (prediction will be
1590  // wrong, otherwise.)
1591  if (delta > 38.75f)
1592  {
1593  VectorClear(pm->ps->velocity);
1594  }
1595 
1596  // start footstep cycle over
1597  pm->ps->bobCycle = 0;
1598 }
1599 
1605 static int PM_CorrectAllSolid(trace_t *trace)
1606 {
1607  int i, j, k;
1608  vec3_t point;
1609 
1610  if (pm->debugLevel)
1611  {
1612  Com_Printf("%i:allsolid\n", c_pmove);
1613  }
1614 
1615  // jitter around
1616  for (i = -1; i <= 1; i++)
1617  {
1618  for (j = -1; j <= 1; j++)
1619  {
1620  for (k = -1; k <= 1; k++)
1621  {
1622  if (!i && !j && !k) // same as checking input origin again..
1623  {
1624  continue;
1625  }
1626 
1627  VectorCopy(pm->ps->origin, point);
1628  point[0] += (float) i;
1629  point[1] += (float) j;
1630  point[2] += (float) k;
1631  PM_TraceAll(trace, point, point);
1632  if (!trace->allsolid)
1633  {
1634  point[0] = pm->ps->origin[0];
1635  point[1] = pm->ps->origin[1];
1636  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] - 0.25f;
1637 
1638  PM_TraceAll(trace, pm->ps->origin, point);
1639  pml.groundTrace = *trace;
1640  return qtrue;
1641  }
1642  }
1643  }
1644  }
1645 
1646  pm->ps->groundEntityNum = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
1647  pml.groundPlane = qfalse;
1648  pml.walking = qfalse;
1649 
1650  return qfalse;
1651 }
1652 
1656 static void PM_GroundTraceMissed(void)
1657 {
1658  if (pm->ps->groundEntityNum != ENTITYNUM_NONE)
1659  {
1660  trace_t trace;
1661  vec3_t point;
1662 
1663  // we just transitioned into freefall
1664  if (pm->debugLevel)
1665  {
1666  Com_Printf("%i:lift\n", c_pmove);
1667  }
1668 
1669  // if they aren't in a jumping animation and the ground is a ways away, force into it
1670  // if we didn't do the trace, the player would be backflipping down staircases
1671  VectorCopy(pm->ps->origin, point);
1672  point[2] -= 64;
1673 
1674  PM_TraceAll(&trace, pm->ps->origin, point);
1675  if (trace.fraction == 1.0f)
1676  {
1677  if (pm->cmd.forwardmove >= 0)
1678  {
1679  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_JUMP, qfalse, qtrue);
1680  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP;
1681  }
1682  else
1683  {
1684  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_JUMPBK, qfalse, qtrue);
1685  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP;
1686  }
1687  }
1688  }
1689 
1690  // If we've never yet touched the ground, it's because we're spawning, so don't
1691  // set to "in air"
1692  if (pm->ps->groundEntityNum != -1)
1693  {
1694  // Signify that we're in mid-air
1695  pm->ps->groundEntityNum = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
1696 
1697  } // if (pm->ps->groundEntityNum != -1)...
1698  pml.groundPlane = qfalse;
1699  pml.walking = qfalse;
1700 }
1701 
1705 static void PM_GroundTrace(void)
1706 {
1707  vec3_t point;
1708  trace_t trace;
1709 
1710  point[0] = pm->ps->origin[0];
1711  point[1] = pm->ps->origin[1];
1712 
1713  if ((pm->ps->eFlags & EF_MG42_ACTIVE) || (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_AAGUN_ACTIVE))
1714  {
1715  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] - 1.f;
1716  }
1717  else
1718  {
1719  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] - 0.25f;
1720  }
1721 
1722  PM_TraceAllParts(&trace, &pm->pmext->proneLegsOffset, pm->ps->origin, point);
1723  pml.groundTrace = trace;
1724 
1725  // do something corrective if the trace starts in a solid...
1726  if (trace.allsolid && !(pm->ps->eFlags & EF_MOUNTEDTANK))
1727  {
1728  if (!PM_CorrectAllSolid(&trace))
1729  {
1730  return;
1731  }
1732  }
1733 
1734  // if the trace didn't hit anything, we are in free fall
1735  if (trace.fraction == 1.0f)
1736  {
1737  PM_GroundTraceMissed();
1738  pml.groundPlane = qfalse;
1739  pml.walking = qfalse;
1740  return;
1741  }
1742 
1743  // check if getting thrown off the ground
1744  if (pm->ps->velocity[2] > 0 && DotProduct(pm->ps->velocity, trace.plane.normal) > 10 && !(pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE))
1745  {
1746  if (pm->debugLevel)
1747  {
1748  Com_Printf("%i:kickoff\n", c_pmove);
1749  }
1750  // go into jump animation (but not under water)
1751  if (pm->waterlevel < 3)
1752  {
1753  if (pm->cmd.forwardmove >= 0)
1754  {
1755  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_JUMP, qfalse, qfalse);
1756  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP;
1757  }
1758  else
1759  {
1760  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_JUMPBK, qfalse, qfalse);
1761  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP;
1762  }
1763  }
1764 
1765  pm->ps->groundEntityNum = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
1766  pml.groundPlane = qfalse;
1767  pml.walking = qfalse;
1768  return;
1769  }
1770 
1771  // slopes that are too steep will not be considered onground
1772  if (trace.plane.normal[2] < MIN_WALK_NORMAL)
1773  {
1774  if (pm->debugLevel)
1775  {
1776  Com_Printf("%i:steep\n", c_pmove);
1777  }
1778  // FIXME: if they can't slide down the slope, let them walk (sharp crevices)
1779  pm->ps->groundEntityNum = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
1780  pml.groundPlane = qtrue;
1781  pml.walking = qfalse;
1782  return;
1783  }
1784 
1785  pml.groundPlane = qtrue;
1786  pml.walking = qtrue;
1787 
1788  // hitting solid ground will end a waterjump
1789  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_TIME_WATERJUMP)
1790  {
1791  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~(PMF_TIME_WATERJUMP | PMF_TIME_LAND);
1792  pm->ps->pm_time = 0;
1793  }
1794 
1795  if (pm->ps->groundEntityNum == ENTITYNUM_NONE)
1796  {
1797  // just hit the ground
1798  if (pm->debugLevel)
1799  {
1800  Com_Printf("%i:land\n", c_pmove);
1801  }
1802 
1803  PM_CrashLand();
1804 
1805  // don't do landing time if we were just going down a slope
1806  if (pml.previous_velocity[2] < -200)
1807  {
1808  // don't allow another jump for a little while
1809  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_TIME_LAND;
1810  pm->ps->pm_time = 250;
1811  }
1812  }
1813 
1814  pm->ps->groundEntityNum = trace.entityNum;
1815 
1816  // don't reset the z velocity for slopes
1817  //pm->ps->velocity[2] = 0;
1818 
1819  PM_AddTouchEnt(trace.entityNum);
1820 }
1821 
1827 static void PM_SetWaterLevel(void)
1828 {
1829  vec3_t point;
1830  int cont;
1831 
1832  // get waterlevel, accounting for ducking
1833  pm->waterlevel = 0;
1834  pm->watertype = 0;
1835 
1836  point[0] = pm->ps->origin[0];
1837  point[1] = pm->ps->origin[1];
1838  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] + pm->ps->mins[2] + 1;
1839  cont = pm->pointcontents(point, pm->ps->clientNum);
1840 
1841  if (cont & MASK_WATER)
1842  {
1843  int sample2 = pm->ps->viewheight - pm->ps->mins[2];
1844  int sample1 = sample2 / 2;
1845 
1846  pm->watertype = cont;
1847  pm->waterlevel = 1;
1848  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] + pm->ps->mins[2] + sample1;
1849  cont = pm->pointcontents(point, pm->ps->clientNum);
1850  if (cont & MASK_WATER)
1851  {
1852  pm->waterlevel = 2;
1853  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] + pm->ps->mins[2] + sample2;
1854  cont = pm->pointcontents(point, pm->ps->clientNum);
1855  if (cont & MASK_WATER)
1856  {
1857  pm->waterlevel = 3;
1858  }
1859  }
1860  }
1861 
1862  // UNDERWATER
1863  BG_UpdateConditionValue(pm->ps->clientNum, ANIM_COND_UNDERWATER, (pm->waterlevel > 2), qtrue);
1864 }
1865 
1869 static void PM_CheckDuck(void)
1870 {
1871  // modified this for configurable bounding boxes
1872  pm->mins[0] = pm->ps->mins[0];
1873  pm->mins[1] = pm->ps->mins[1];
1874 
1875  pm->maxs[0] = pm->ps->maxs[0];
1876  pm->maxs[1] = pm->ps->maxs[1];
1877 
1878  pm->mins[2] = pm->ps->mins[2];
1879 
1880  if (pm->ps->pm_type == PM_DEAD)
1881  {
1882  pm->maxs[2] = pm->ps->maxs[2]; // NOTE: must set death bounding box in game code
1883  pm->ps->viewheight = pm->ps->deadViewHeight;
1884  return;
1885  }
1886 
1887  // duck
1888  if ((pm->cmd.upmove < 0 && !(pm->ps->eFlags & EF_MOUNTEDTANK) && !(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_LADDER))
1889  || CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
1890  {
1891  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_DUCKED;
1892  }
1893  else // stand up if possible
1894  {
1895  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_DUCKED)
1896  {
1897  trace_t trace;
1898 
1899  // try to stand up
1900  pm->maxs[2] = pm->ps->maxs[2];
1901  PM_TraceAll(&trace, pm->ps->origin, pm->ps->origin);
1902  if (trace.fraction == 1.0f)
1903  {
1904  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_DUCKED;
1905  }
1906  }
1907  }
1908 
1909  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_DUCKED)
1910  {
1911  pm->maxs[2] = pm->ps->crouchMaxZ;
1912  pm->ps->viewheight = pm->ps->crouchViewHeight;
1913  }
1914  else
1915  {
1916  pm->maxs[2] = pm->ps->maxs[2];
1917  pm->ps->viewheight = pm->ps->standViewHeight;
1918  }
1919 }

1926 static void PM_Footsteps(void)
1927 {
1928  float bobmove;
1929  int old;
1930  qboolean footstep;
1931  int animResult = -1; // FIXME: never used
1932 
1933  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_DEAD)
1934  {
1935  //if ( pm->ps->groundEntityNum == ENTITYNUM_NONE )
1936  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_FLAILING)
1937  {
1938  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_FLAILING, qtrue);
1939 
1940  if (!pm->ps->pm_time)
1941  {
1942  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_FLAILING; // the eagle has landed
1943  }
1944  }
1945  else if (!pm->ps->pm_time && !(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_LIMBO)) // before going to limbo, play a wounded/fallen animation
1946  {
1947  if (pm->ps->groundEntityNum == ENTITYNUM_NONE)
1948  {
1949  // takeoff!
1950  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_FLAILING;
1951  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_FLAILING, qtrue);
1952  }
1953  else
1954  {
1955  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_FALLEN, qtrue);
1956  }
1957  }
1958 
1959  return;
1960  }
1961 
1962  // calculate speed and cycle to be used for
1963  // all cyclic walking effects
1964  pm->xyspeed = sqrt(pm->ps->velocity[0] * pm->ps->velocity[0] + pm->ps->velocity[1] * pm->ps->velocity[1]);
1965 
1966  // mg42, always idle
1967  if (pm->ps->persistant[PERS_HWEAPON_USE])
1968  {
1969  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_IDLE, qtrue);
1970 
1971  return;
1972  }
1973 
1974  // swimming
1975  if (pm->waterlevel > 2 || (pm->waterlevel > 1 && pm->ps->groundEntityNum == ENTITYNUM_NONE))
1976  {
1977  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_BACKWARDS_RUN)
1978  {
1979  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_SWIMBK, qtrue);
1980  }
1981  else
1982  {
1983  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_SWIM, qtrue);
1984  }
1985 
1986  return;
1987  }
1988 
1989  // in the air
1990  if (pm->ps->groundEntityNum == ENTITYNUM_NONE)
1991  {
1992  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_LADDER) // on ladder
1993  {
1994  if (pm->ps->velocity[2] >= 0)
1995  {
1996  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_CLIMBUP, qtrue);
1997  }
1998  else
1999  {
2000  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_CLIMBDOWN, qtrue);
2001  }
2002  }
2003 
2004  return;
2005  }
2006 
2007  // if not trying to move
2008  if (!pm->cmd.forwardmove && !pm->cmd.rightmove)
2009  {
2010  if (pm->xyspeed < 5)
2011  {
2012  pm->ps->bobCycle = 0; // start at beginning of cycle again
2013  }
2014  if (pm->xyspeed > 120)
2015  {
2016  return; // continue what they were doing last frame, until we stop
2017  }
2018 
2019  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
2020  {
2021  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_TALK)
2022  {
2023  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_RADIOPRONE, qtrue);
2024  }
2025  else
2026  {
2027  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_IDLEPRONE, qtrue);
2028  }
2029  }
2030  else if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_DUCKED)
2031  {
2032  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_TALK)
2033  {
2034  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_RADIOCR, qtrue);
2035  }
2036  else
2037  {
2038  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_IDLECR, qtrue);
2039  }
2040  }
2041 
2042  if (animResult < 0)
2043  {
2044  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_TALK)
2045  {
2046  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_RADIO, qtrue);
2047  }
2048  else
2049  {
2050  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_IDLE, qtrue);
2051  }
2052  }
2053 
2054  return;
2055  }
2056 
2057  footstep = qfalse;
2058 
2059  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
2060  {
2061  bobmove = 0.2f; // prone characters bob slower
2062  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_BACKWARDS_RUN)
2063  {
2064  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_PRONEBK, qtrue);
2065  }
2066  else
2067  {
2068  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_PRONE, qtrue);
2069  }
2070  // prone characters never play footsteps
2071  }
2072  else if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_DUCKED)
2073  {
2074  bobmove = 0.5; // ducked characters bob much faster
2075  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_BACKWARDS_RUN)
2076  {
2077  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_WALKCRBK, qtrue);
2078  }
2079  else
2080  {
2081  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_WALKCR, qtrue);
2082  }
2083  // ducked characters never play footsteps
2084  }
2085  else if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_BACKWARDS_RUN)
2086  {
2087  if (!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_WALKING))
2088  {
2089  bobmove = 0.4f; // faster speeds bob faster
2090  footstep = qtrue;
2091  // check for strafing
2092  if (pm->cmd.rightmove && !pm->cmd.forwardmove)
2093  {
2094  if (pm->cmd.rightmove > 0)
2095  {
2096  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_STRAFERIGHT, qtrue);
2097  }
2098  else
2099  {
2100  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_STRAFELEFT, qtrue);
2101  }
2102  }
2103  if (animResult < 0) // if we havent found an anim yet, play the run
2104  {
2105  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_RUNBK, qtrue);
2106  }
2107  }
2108  else
2109  {
2110  bobmove = 0.3f;
2111  // check for strafing
2112  if (pm->cmd.rightmove && !pm->cmd.forwardmove)
2113  {
2114  if (pm->cmd.rightmove > 0)
2115  {
2116  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_STRAFERIGHT, qtrue);
2117  }
2118  else
2119  {
2120  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_STRAFELEFT, qtrue);
2121  }
2122  }
2123  if (animResult < 0) // if we havent found an anim yet, play the run
2124  {
2125  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_WALKBK, qtrue);
2126  }
2127  }
2128  }
2129  else
2130  {
2131  if (!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_WALKING))
2132  {
2133  bobmove = 0.4f; // faster speeds bob faster
2134  footstep = qtrue;
2135  // check for strafing
2136  if (pm->cmd.rightmove && !pm->cmd.forwardmove)
2137  {
2138  if (pm->cmd.rightmove > 0)
2139  {
2140  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_STRAFERIGHT, qtrue);
2141  }
2142  else
2143  {
2144  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_STRAFELEFT, qtrue);
2145  }
2146  }
2147  if (animResult < 0) // if we havent found an anim yet, play the run
2148  {
2149  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_RUN, qtrue);
2150  }
2151  }
2152  else
2153  {
2154  bobmove = 0.3f; // walking bobs slow
2155  if (pm->cmd.rightmove && !pm->cmd.forwardmove)
2156  {
2157  if (pm->cmd.rightmove > 0)
2158  {
2159  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_STRAFERIGHT, qtrue);
2160  }
2161  else
2162  {
2163  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_STRAFELEFT, qtrue);
2164  }
2165  }
2166  if (animResult < 0) // if we havent found an anim yet, play the run
2167  {
2168  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_WALK, qtrue);
2169  }
2170  }
2171  }
2172 
2173  // if no anim found yet, then just use the idle as default
2174  if (animResult < 0)
2175  {
2176  animResult = BG_AnimScriptAnimation(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_MT_IDLE, qtrue);
2177  }
2178 
2179  // check for footstep / splash sounds
2180  old = pm->ps->bobCycle;
2181  pm->ps->bobCycle = (int)(old + bobmove * pml.msec) & 255;
2182 
2183  if (((old + 64) ^ (pm->ps->bobCycle + 64)) & 128)
2184  {
2185  switch (pm->waterlevel)
2186  {
2187  case 0:
2188  // on ground will only play sounds if running
2189  if (footstep && !pm->noFootsteps)
2190  {
2191  PM_AddEventExt(EV_FOOTSTEP, PM_FootstepForSurface());
2192  }
2193  break;
2194  case 1:
2195  // splashing
2196  PM_AddEvent(EV_FOOTSPLASH);
2197  break;
2198  case 2:
2199  // wading / swimming at surface
2200  PM_AddEvent(EV_SWIM);
2201  break;
2202  case 3:
2203  // no sound when completely underwater
2204  break;
2205  default:
2206  break;
2207  }
2208  }
2209 }
2210 
2214 static void PM_WaterEvents(void)
2215 {
2216  // if just entered a water volume, play a sound
2217  if (!pml.previous_waterlevel && pm->waterlevel)
2218  {
2219  PM_AddEvent(EV_WATER_TOUCH);
2220  }
2221 
2222  // if just completely exited a water volume, play a sound
2223  if (pml.previous_waterlevel && !pm->waterlevel)
2224  {
2225  PM_AddEvent(EV_WATER_LEAVE);
2226  }
2227 
2228  // check for head just going under water
2229  if (pml.previous_waterlevel != 3 && pm->waterlevel == 3)
2230  {
2231  PM_AddEvent(EV_WATER_UNDER);
2232  }
2233 
2234  // check for head just coming out of water
2235  if (pml.previous_waterlevel == 3 && pm->waterlevel != 3)
2236  {
2237  if (pm->pmext->airleft < 6000)
2238  {
2239  PM_AddEventExt(EV_WATER_CLEAR, 1);
2240  }
2241  else
2242  {
2243  PM_AddEventExt(EV_WATER_CLEAR, 0);
2244  }
2245  }
2246 
2247  // fix prediction, ensure full HOLDBREATHTIME when airleft isn't in use
2248  if (pm->pmext->airleft < 0 || pm->pmext->airleft > HOLDBREATHTIME)
2249  {
2250  pm->ps->stats[STAT_AIRLEFT] = HOLDBREATHTIME;
2251  }
2252  else
2253  {
2254  pm->ps->stats[STAT_AIRLEFT] = pm->pmext->airleft;
2255  }
2256 }
2257 
2262 static void PM_BeginWeaponReload(weapon_t weapon)
2263 {
2264  int reloadTime;
2265 
2266  // only allow reload if the weapon isn't already occupied (firing is okay)
2267  if (pm->ps->weaponstate != WEAPON_READY && pm->ps->weaponstate != WEAPON_FIRING)
2268  {
2269  return;
2270  }
2271 
2272  if (!IS_VALID_WEAPON(weapon))
2273  {
2274  return;
2275  }
2276 
2277  // weapon which don't use ammo don't have reload anim
2278  // TODO: this check seem useless ! weapon which don't use ammo don't enter in this function
2279  if (!GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->useAmmo)
2280  {
2281  return;
2282  }
2283 
2284  // fixing reloading with a full clip
2285  if (pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->clipIndex] >= GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->maxClip)
2286  {
2287  // akimbo should also check other weapon status
2288  if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_AKIMBO)
2289  {
2290  if (pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->akimboSideArm)->clipIndex] >= GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->akimboSideArm)->clipIndex)->maxClip)
2291  {
2292  return;
2293  }
2294  }
2295  else
2296  {
2297  return;
2298  }
2299  }
2300 
2301  // no reload when leaning (this includes manual and auto reloads but no throwable as nade and canister)
2302  if (pm->ps->leanf != 0.f && !(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->firingMode & WEAPON_FIRING_MODE_THROWABLE))
2303  {
2304  return;
2305  }
2306 
2307  // easier check now that the animation system handles the specifics
2308  if (!(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->firingMode & WEAPON_FIRING_MODE_THROWABLE))
2309  {
2310  // override current animation (so reloading after firing will work)
2311  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
2312  {
2313  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_RELOADPRONE, qfalse, qtrue);
2314  }
2315  else
2316  {
2317  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_RELOAD, qfalse, qtrue);
2318  }
2319  }
2320 
2321  if (!(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR))
2322  {
2323  PM_ContinueWeaponAnim(PM_ReloadAnimForWeapon(pm->ps->weapon));
2324  }
2325 
2326  // okay to reload while overheating without tacking the reload time onto the end of the
2327  // current weaponTime (the reload time is partially absorbed into the overheat time)
2328  reloadTime = GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->reloadTime;
2329  if (pm->skill[SK_LIGHT_WEAPONS] >= 2 && (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_FAST_RELOAD))
2330  {
2331  reloadTime *= .65f;
2332  }
2333 
2334  if (pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_READY)
2335  {
2336  pm->ps->weaponTime += reloadTime;
2337  }
2338  else if (pm->ps->weaponTime < reloadTime)
2339  {
2340  pm->ps->weaponTime += (reloadTime - pm->ps->weaponTime);
2341  }
2342 
2343  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_RELOADING;
2344 
2345  // FIXME: Currently, the rifle nade play an extra reload sound which wasn't used before. Maybe we should get ride of this in pak0.
2346  // once theses sound remove, we can remove this check below
2347  if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->useClip)
2348  {
2349  PM_AddEvent(EV_FILL_CLIP); // play reload sound
2350  }
2351 }
2352 
2359 static void PM_BeginWeaponChange(weapon_t oldWeapon, weapon_t newWeapon, qboolean reload) // modified to play 1st person alt-mode transition animations.
2360 {
2361  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_RESPAWNED)
2362  {
2363  return; // don't allow weapon switch until all buttons are up
2364  }
2365 
2366  if (!IS_VALID_WEAPON(newWeapon))
2367  {
2368  return;
2369  }
2370 
2371  if (!(COM_BitCheck(pm->ps->weapons, newWeapon)))
2372  {
2373  return;
2374  }
2375 
2376  if (pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_DROPPING || pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_DROPPING_TORELOAD ||
2377  pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_RELOADING)
2378  {
2379  return;
2380  }
2381 
2382  // don't allow another weapon switch when we're still swapping alt weap, to prevent animation breaking
2383  // there we check the value of the animation to prevent any switch during raising and dropping alt weapon
2384  // until the animation is ended
2385  if ((pm->ps->weapAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT) == WEAP_ALTSWITCHFROM ||
2386  (pm->ps->weapAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT) == WEAP_ALTSWITCHTO)
2387  {
2388  return;
2389  }
2390 
2391  // don't allow change during spinup
2392  if (pm->ps->weaponDelay)
2393  {
2394  return;
2395  }
2396 
2397  // don't allow switch if you're holding a hot potato or dynamite
2398  if (pm->ps->grenadeTimeLeft > 0)
2399  {
2400  return;
2401  }
2402 
2403  pm->ps->nextWeapon = newWeapon;
2404 
2405  // it's an alt mode, play different anim
2406  if (newWeapon == GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->weapAlts)
2407  {
2408  // don't send change weapon event after firing with riflenade
2409  if (!(GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLENADE) || pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->ammoIndex])
2410  {
2411  PM_AddEvent(EV_CHANGE_WEAPON_2);
2412 
2413  // special case for silenced pistol
2414  if (((GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PISTOL) && (GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_SILENCED)))
2415  {
2416  PM_StartWeaponAnim(WEAP_ALTSWITCHTO);
2417 
2418  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
2419  {
2420  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_UNDO_ALT_WEAPON_MODE_PRONE, qfalse, qfalse);
2421  }
2422  else
2423  {
2424  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_UNDO_ALT_WEAPON_MODE, qfalse, qfalse);
2425  }
2426 
2427  pm->ps->weaponTime += GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->altSwitchTimeTo;
2428  }
2429 
2430  if (GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SET)
2431  {
2432  vec3_t axis[3];
2433 
2434  VectorCopy(pml.forward, axis[0]);
2435  VectorCopy(pml.right, axis[2]);
2436  CrossProduct(axis[0], axis[2], axis[1]);
2437  AxisToAngles(axis, pm->pmext->mountedWeaponAngles);
2438  }
2439  }
2440  }
2441  else
2442  {
2443  PM_AddEvent(EV_CHANGE_WEAPON);
2444 
2445  PM_StartWeaponAnim(WEAP_DROP);
2446 
2447  // play an animation
2448  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_DROPWEAPON, qfalse, qfalse);
2449 
2450  pm->ps->weaponTime += GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->switchTimeBegin; // dropping/raising usually takes 1/4 sec.
2451  }
2452 
2453  pm->ps->weaponstate = reload ? WEAPON_DROPPING_TORELOAD : WEAPON_DROPPING;
2454 }
2455 
2459 static void PM_FinishWeaponChange(void)
2460 {
2461  weapon_t oldWeapon = (weapon_t)pm->ps->weapon, newWeapon = (weapon_t)pm->ps->nextWeapon;
2462 
2463  // Cannot switch to an invalid weapon
2464  if (!IS_VALID_WEAPON(newWeapon))
2465  {
2466  newWeapon = WP_NONE;
2467  }
2468 
2469  // Cannot switch to a weapon you don't have
2470  if (!(COM_BitCheck(pm->ps->weapons, newWeapon)))
2471  {
2472  newWeapon = WP_NONE;
2473  }
2474 
2475  pm->ps->weapon = newWeapon;
2476 
2477  if (pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_DROPPING_TORELOAD)
2478  {
2479  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_RAISING_TORELOAD;
2480  }
2481  else
2482  {
2483  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_RAISING;
2484  }
2485 
2486  // don't really care about anim since these weapons don't show in view.
2487  // However, need to set the animspreadscale so they are initally at worst accuracy
2488  if (GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED)
2489  {
2490  pm->ps->aimSpreadScale = AIMSPREAD_MAXSPREAD; // initially at lowest accuracy
2491  pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat = AIMSPREAD_MAXSPREAD; // initially at lowest accuracy
2492  }
2493  else if (GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PISTOL)
2494  {
2495  if (GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_SILENCED)
2496  {
2497  pm->pmext->silencedSideArm |= 1;
2498  }
2499  else
2500  {
2501  pm->pmext->silencedSideArm &= ~1;
2502  }
2503  }
2504  else if (GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE)
2505  {
2506  pm->pmext->silencedSideArm &= ~2;
2507  }
2508  else if (GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLENADE)
2509  {
2510  pm->pmext->silencedSideArm |= 2;
2511  }
2512 
2513  // doesn't happen too often (player switched weapons away then back very quickly)
2514  if (oldWeapon == newWeapon)
2515  {
2516  return;
2517  }
2518 
2519  // play an animation
2520  if (GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->weapAlts == newWeapon)
2521  {
2522  if (((GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE) && !pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->ammoIndex])
2523  || ((GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PISTOL) && (GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_SILENCED)))
2524  {
2525  return;
2526  }
2527 
2528  BG_UpdateConditionValue(pm->ps->clientNum, ANIM_COND_WEAPON, newWeapon, qtrue);
2529 
2530  if (GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->type & (WEAPON_TYPE_SET | WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED | WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLENADE))
2531  {
2532  PM_StartWeaponAnim(WEAP_ALTSWITCHTO);
2533 
2534  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
2535  {
2536  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_UNDO_ALT_WEAPON_MODE_PRONE, qfalse, qfalse);
2537  }
2538  else
2539  {
2540  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_UNDO_ALT_WEAPON_MODE, qfalse, qfalse);
2541  }
2542 
2543  pm->ps->weaponTime += GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->altSwitchTimeTo;
2544  }
2545  else
2546  {
2547  PM_StartWeaponAnim(WEAP_ALTSWITCHFROM);
2548 
2549  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
2550  {
2551  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_DO_ALT_WEAPON_MODE_PRONE, qfalse, qfalse);
2552  }
2553  else
2554  {
2555  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_DO_ALT_WEAPON_MODE, qfalse, qfalse);
2556  }
2557 
2558  pm->ps->weaponTime += GetWeaponTableData(oldWeapon)->altSwitchTimeFrom;
2559  }
2560  }
2561  else
2562  {
2563  BG_UpdateConditionValue(pm->ps->clientNum, ANIM_COND_WEAPON, newWeapon, qtrue);
2564 
2565  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
2566  {
2567  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_RAISEWEAPONPRONE, qfalse, qfalse);
2568  }
2569  else
2570  {
2571  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_RAISEWEAPON, qfalse, qfalse);
2572  }
2573 
2574  PM_StartWeaponAnim(WEAP_RAISE);
2575 
2576  pm->ps->weaponTime += GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->switchTimeFinish; // dropping/raising usually takes 1/4 sec.
2577  }
2578 }
2579 
2584 static void PM_ReloadClip(weapon_t weapon)
2585 {
2586  int ammoreserve = pm->ps->ammo[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->ammoIndex];
2587  int ammoclip = pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->clipIndex];
2588  int ammomove = GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->maxClip - ammoclip;
2589 
2590  if (ammoreserve < ammomove)
2591  {
2592  ammomove = ammoreserve;
2593  }
2594 
2595  if (ammomove)
2596  {
2597  pm->ps->ammo[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->ammoIndex] -= ammomove;
2598  pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->clipIndex] += ammomove;
2599  }
2600 
2601  // reload akimbo stuff
2602  if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_AKIMBO)
2603  {
2604  PM_ReloadClip(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->akimboSideArm);
2605  }
2606 }
2607 
2611 static void PM_FinishWeaponReload(void)
2612 {
2613  PM_ReloadClip(pm->ps->weapon); // move ammo into clip
2614  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_READY; // ready to fire
2615  PM_StartWeaponAnim(PM_IdleAnimForWeapon(pm->ps->weapon));
2616 }
2617 
2622 void PM_CheckForReload(weapon_t weapon)
2623 {
2624  if (pm->noWeapClips) // no need to reload
2625  {
2626  return;
2627  }
2628 
2629  // some weapons don't use ammo and no need to reload
2630  if (!GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->useAmmo)
2631  {
2632  return;
2633  }
2634 
2635  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_ZOOMING)
2636  {
2637  return;
2638  }
2639 
2640  if (pm->ps->weaponstate != WEAPON_READY && pm->ps->weaponstate != WEAPON_FIRING)
2641  {
2642  return;
2643  }
2644 
2645  if (pm->ps->weaponTime <= 0)
2646  {
2647  qboolean doReload = qfalse;
2648 
2649  // user is forcing a reload (manual reload)
2650  if (pm->cmd.wbuttons & WBUTTON_RELOAD)
2651  {
2652  if (pm->ps->ammo[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->ammoIndex])
2653  {
2654  if (pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->clipIndex] < GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->maxClip)
2655  {
2656  doReload = qtrue;
2657  }
2658 
2659  // akimbo should also check other weapon status
2660  if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_AKIMBO)
2661  {
2662  if (pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->akimboSideArm)->clipIndex] < GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->akimboSideArm)->clipIndex)->maxClip)
2663  {
2664  doReload = qtrue;
2665  }
2666  }
2667  }
2668  }
2669  else if (pm->pmext->bAutoReload || !(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->firingMode & (WEAPON_FIRING_MODE_AUTOMATIC | WEAPON_FIRING_MODE_SEMI_AUTOMATIC))) // auto reload
2670  {
2671  if (!pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->clipIndex] && pm->ps->ammo[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->ammoIndex])
2672  {
2673  if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_AKIMBO)
2674  {
2675  if (!pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->akimboSideArm)->clipIndex])
2676  {
2677  doReload = qtrue;
2678  }
2679  }
2680  else
2681  {
2682  doReload = qtrue;
2683  }
2684  }
2685  }
2686 
2687  if (doReload)
2688  {
2689  if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED)
2690  {
2691  PM_BeginWeaponChange(weapon, GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->weapAlts, qtrue);
2692  }
2693 
2694  PM_BeginWeaponReload(weapon);
2695  }
2696  }
2697 }
2698 
2702 static void PM_SwitchIfEmpty(void)
2703 {
2704  // weapon here are explosives or syringe/adrenaline, if they are not --> return
2705  if (!(GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->firingMode & (WEAPON_FIRING_MODE_ONE_SHOT | WEAPON_FIRING_MODE_THROWABLE)))
2706  {
2707  return;
2708  }
2709 
2710  // In multiplayer, pfaust fires once then switches to pistol since it's useless for a while
2711  // after throwing landmine, let switch to pliers
2712  if (!(GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->firingMode & WEAPON_FIRING_MODE_ONE_SHOT))
2713  {
2714  // don't consumme ammo
2715  if (!GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->useAmmo)
2716  {
2717  return;
2718  }
2719 
2720  // use clip and still got ammo in clip
2721  if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->useClip && pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->clipIndex])
2722  {
2723  return;
2724  }
2725 
2726  // still got ammo in reserve
2727  if (pm->ps->ammo[GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->ammoIndex])
2728  {
2729  return;
2730  }
2731  }
2732 
2733  // If this was the last one, remove the weapon and switch away before the player tries to fire next
2734  // NOTE: giving grenade ammo to a player will re-give him the weapon (if you do it through add_ammo())
2735  if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_GRENADE)
2736  {
2737  COM_BitClear(pm->ps->weapons, pm->ps->weapon);
2738  }
2739  else if (pm->ps->weapon == WP_SATCHEL)
2740  {
2741  pm->ps->ammoclip[WP_SATCHEL_DET] = 1;
2742  pm->ps->ammoclip[WP_SATCHEL] = 0;
2743  }
2744 
2745  // force switching to rifle
2746  if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLENADE)
2747  {
2748  PM_BeginWeaponChange(pm->ps->weapon, GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->weapAlts, qfalse);
2749  }
2750 
2751  PM_AddEvent(EV_NOAMMO);
2752 }
2753 
2759 void PM_WeaponUseAmmo(weapon_t wp, int amount)
2760 {
2761  if (pm->noWeapClips)
2762  {
2763  pm->ps->ammo[GetWeaponTableData(wp)->ammoIndex] -= amount;
2764  }
2765  else
2766  {
2767  int takeweapon = GetWeaponTableData(wp)->clipIndex;
2768 
2769  if (GetWeaponTableData(wp)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_AKIMBO)
2770  {
2771  if (!BG_AkimboFireSequence(wp, pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(wp)->clipIndex], pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(wp)->akimboSideArm)->clipIndex]))
2772  {
2773  takeweapon = GetWeaponTableData(wp)->akimboSideArm;
2774  }
2775  }
2776 
2777  pm->ps->ammoclip[takeweapon] -= amount;
2778  }
2779 }

2786 int PM_WeaponAmmoAvailable(weapon_t wp)
2787 {
2788  if (pm->noWeapClips)
2789  {
2790  return pm->ps->ammo[GetWeaponTableData(wp)->ammoIndex];
2791  }
2792 
2793  if (GetWeaponTableData(wp)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_AKIMBO)
2794  {
2795  if (!BG_AkimboFireSequence(wp, pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(wp)->clipIndex], pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(wp)->akimboSideArm)->clipIndex]))
2796  {
2797  return pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(wp)->akimboSideArm];
2798  }
2799  }
2800 
2801  return pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(wp)->clipIndex];
2802 }

2809 qboolean PM_WeaponClipEmpty(weapon_t wp)

2812  {
2813  return !pm->ps->ammo[GetWeaponTableData(wp)->ammoIndex];
2814  }

2816  return !pm->ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(wp)->clipIndex];

2822 void PM_CoolWeapons(void)
2823 {
2824  weapon_t wp;
2825 
2826  for (wp = WP_KNIFE; wp < WP_NUM_WEAPONS; wp++)
2827  {
2828  // if the weapon can heat and you have the weapon
2829  // dummy MG42 can't be equipped but still have a cool down
2830  if (GetWeaponTableData(wp)->maxHeat && (COM_BitCheck(pm->ps->weapons, wp) || wp == WP_DUMMY_MG42))
2831  {
2832  // and it's hot
2833  if (pm->ps->weapHeat[wp])
2834  {
2835  if (pm->skill[SK_HEAVY_WEAPONS] >= 2 && pm->ps->stats[STAT_PLAYER_CLASS] == PC_SOLDIER)
2836  {
2837  pm->ps->weapHeat[wp] -= ((float)GetWeaponTableData(wp)->coolRate * 2.f * pml.frametime);
2838  }
2839  else
2840  {
2841  pm->ps->weapHeat[wp] -= ((float)GetWeaponTableData(wp)->coolRate * pml.frametime);
2842  }
2843 
2844  if (pm->ps->weapHeat[wp] < 0)
2845  {
2846  pm->ps->weapHeat[wp] = 0;
2847  }
2848  }
2849  }
2850  }
2851 
2852  // current weapon can heat, convert current heat value to 0-255 range for client transmission
2853  if (BG_PlayerMounted(pm->ps->eFlags))
2854  {
2855  pm->ps->curWeapHeat = (int)(floor((pm->ps->weapHeat[WP_DUMMY_MG42] / (double)GetWeaponTableData(WP_DUMMY_MG42)->maxHeat) * 255));
2856  }
2857  else if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->maxHeat)
2858  {
2859  pm->ps->curWeapHeat = (int)(floor((pm->ps->weapHeat[pm->ps->weapon] / (double)GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->maxHeat) * 255));
2860  }
2861  else
2862  {
2863  pm->ps->curWeapHeat = 0;
2864  }
2865 
2866  // sanity check weapon heat
2867  if (pm->ps->curWeapHeat > 255)
2868  {
2869  pm->ps->curWeapHeat = 255;
2870  }
2871  else if (pm->ps->curWeapHeat < 0)
2872  {
2873  pm->ps->curWeapHeat = 0;
2874  }
2875 }
2876 
2877 #define AIMSPREAD_DECREASE_RATE 200.0f // when I made the increase/decrease floats (so slower weapon recover could happen for scoped weaps) the average rate increased significantly
2878 #define AIMSPREAD_INCREASE_RATE 800.0f
2879 #define AIMSPREAD_VIEWRATE_MIN 30.0f // degrees per second
2880 #define AIMSPREAD_VIEWRATE_RANGE 120.0f // degrees per second
2881 
2885 void PM_AdjustAimSpreadScale(void)
2886 {
2887  int i;
2888  float increase, decrease; // was losing lots of precision on slower weapons (scoped)
2889  float cmdTime, wpnScale;
2890 
2891  // all weapons are very inaccurate in zoomed mode
2892  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_ZOOMING)
2893  {
2894  pm->ps->aimSpreadScale = AIMSPREAD_MAXSPREAD;
2895  pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat = AIMSPREAD_MAXSPREAD;
2896  return;
2897  }
2898 
2899  cmdTime = (pm->cmd.serverTime - pm->oldcmd.serverTime) / 1000.0f;
2900 
2901  wpnScale = GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->spreadScale;
2902 
2903  if (wpnScale != 0.f)
2904  {
2905  float viewchange = 0;
2906 
2907  if ((GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED) && pm->skill[SK_MILITARY_INTELLIGENCE_AND_SCOPED_WEAPONS] >= 3)
2908  {
2909  wpnScale *= 0.5;
2910  }
2911 
2912  // crouched players recover faster (mostly useful for snipers)
2913  if ((pm->ps->eFlags & EF_CROUCHING) || (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE))
2914  {
2915  wpnScale *= 0.5;
2916  }
2917 
2918  decrease = (cmdTime * AIMSPREAD_DECREASE_RATE) / wpnScale;
2919 
2920  // take player movement into account (even if only for the scoped weapons)
2921  // TODO: also check for jump/crouch and adjust accordingly
2922  if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED)
2923  {
2924  for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
2925  {
2926  viewchange += Q_fabs(pm->ps->velocity[i]);
2927  }
2928  }
2929  else
2930  {
2931  // take player view rotation into account
2932  for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
2933  {
2934  viewchange += Q_fabs(SHORT2ANGLE(pm->cmd.angles[i]) - SHORT2ANGLE(pm->oldcmd.angles[i]));
2935  }
2936  }
2937 
2938  viewchange = viewchange / cmdTime; // convert into this movement for a second
2939  viewchange -= AIMSPREAD_VIEWRATE_MIN / wpnScale;
2940  if (viewchange <= 0)
2941  {
2942  viewchange = 0;
2943  }
2944  else if (viewchange > (AIMSPREAD_VIEWRATE_RANGE / wpnScale))
2945  {
2946  viewchange = AIMSPREAD_VIEWRATE_RANGE / wpnScale;
2947  }
2948 
2949  // now give us a scale from 0.0 to 1.0 to apply the spread increase
2950  viewchange = viewchange / (AIMSPREAD_VIEWRATE_RANGE / wpnScale);
2951 
2952  increase = (int)(cmdTime * viewchange * AIMSPREAD_INCREASE_RATE);
2953  }
2954  else
2955  {
2956  increase = 0;
2957  decrease = AIMSPREAD_DECREASE_RATE;
2958  }
2959 
2960 
2961  if (PM_PRONEDELAY && pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat == AIMSPREAD_MAXSPREAD && pm->cmd.serverTime - pm->pmext->proneTime < MAX_AIMSPREAD_TIME)
2962  {
2963  return;
2964  }
2965 
2966  // update the aimSpreadScale
2967  pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat += (increase - decrease);
2968  if (pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat < 0)
2969  {
2970  pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat = 0;
2971  }
2972  if (pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat > AIMSPREAD_MAXSPREAD)
2973  {
2974  pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat = AIMSPREAD_MAXSPREAD;
2975  }
2976 
2977  pm->ps->aimSpreadScale = (int)pm->ps->aimSpreadScaleFloat; // update the int for the client
2978 }
2979 
2980 #define weaponstateFiring (pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_FIRING /*|| pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_FIRINGALT*/)

2986 static qboolean PM_MountedFire(void)
2987 {
2988  // player is not using mounted weapon
2989  if (!BG_PlayerMounted(pm->ps->eFlags))
2990  {
2991  return qfalse;
2992  }
2993 
2994  if (pm->ps->weaponTime > 0)
2995  {
2996  pm->ps->weaponTime -= pml.msec;
2997  if (pm->ps->weaponTime <= 0)
2998  {
2999  if (!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK))
3000  {
3001  pm->ps->weaponTime = 0;
3002  return qtrue;
3003  }
3004  }
3005  else
3006  {
3007  return qtrue;
3008  }
3009  }
3010 
3011  if (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK)
3012  {
3013  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_AAGUN_ACTIVE)
3014  {
3015  PM_AddEvent(EV_FIRE_WEAPON_AAGUN);
3016  pm->ps->weaponTime += AAGUN_RATE_OF_FIRE;
3017 
3018  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_FIREWEAPON, qfalse, qtrue);
3019  //pm->ps->viewlocked = VIEWLOCK_JITTER; // this enable screen jitter when firing
3020  }
3021  else // EF_MOUNTEDTANK | EF_MG42_ACTIVE
3022  {
3023  pm->ps->weaponTime += GetWeaponTableData(WP_DUMMY_MG42)->nextShotTime;
3024  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_FIREWEAPON, qfalse, qtrue);
3025 
3026  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_MG42_ACTIVE)
3027  {
3028  PM_AddEvent(EV_FIRE_WEAPON_MG42);
3029  pm->ps->viewlocked = VIEWLOCK_JITTER; // this enable screen jitter when firing
3030  }
3031  else
3032  {
3033  PM_AddEvent(EV_FIRE_WEAPON_MOUNTEDMG42);
3034  //pm->ps->viewlocked = VIEWLOCK_JITTER; // this enable screen jitter when firing
3035  }
3036 
3037  pm->ps->weapHeat[WP_DUMMY_MG42] += GetWeaponTableData(WP_DUMMY_MG42)->nextShotTime;
3038 
3039  // check for overheat
3040  if (pm->ps->weapHeat[WP_DUMMY_MG42] >= GetWeaponTableData(WP_DUMMY_MG42)->maxHeat)
3041  {
3042  pm->ps->weapHeat[WP_DUMMY_MG42] = GetWeaponTableData(WP_DUMMY_MG42)->maxHeat; // cap heat to max
3043  PM_AddEvent(EV_WEAP_OVERHEAT);
3044  pm->ps->weaponTime = GetWeaponTableData(WP_DUMMY_MG42)->heatRecoveryTime; // force "heat recovery minimum" right now
3045  }
3046  }
3047  }
3048 
3049  return qtrue;
3050 }

3056 static qboolean PM_CheckGrenade()
3057 {
3058  if (pm->ps->grenadeTimeLeft > 0)
3059  {
3060  pm->ps->grenadeTimeLeft -= pml.msec;
3061 
3062  if (pm->ps->grenadeTimeLeft <= 100) // give two frames advance notice so there's time to launch and detonate
3063  {
3064  pm->ps->grenadeTimeLeft = 100;
3065  }
3066  else if ((pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK) && !(pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE_MOVING))
3067  {
3068  return qtrue;
3069  }
3070  }
3071  else if (pm->ps->weapon == WP_DYNAMITE)
3072  {
3073  // keep dynamite in hand until fire button is released
3074  if ((pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK) && !(pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE_MOVING) && weaponstateFiring && !pm->ps->weaponTime)
3075  {
3076  return qtrue;
3077  }
3078  }
3079 
3080  return qfalse;
3081 }

3086 static void PM_HandleRecoil(void)
3087 {
3088  if (pm->pmext->weapRecoilTime)
3089  {
3090  vec3_t muzzlebounce;
3091  int i;
3092  int cmdAngle;
3093  int deltaTime = pm->cmd.serverTime - pm->pmext->weapRecoilTime;
3094 
3095  VectorCopy(pm->ps->viewangles, muzzlebounce);
3096 
3097  if (deltaTime > pm->pmext->weapRecoilDuration)
3098  {
3099  deltaTime = pm->pmext->weapRecoilDuration;
3100  }
3101 
3102  for (i = pm->pmext->lastRecoilDeltaTime; i < deltaTime; i += 15)
3103  {
3104  if (pm->pmext->weapRecoilPitch > 0.f)
3105  {
3106  muzzlebounce[PITCH] -= 2 * pm->pmext->weapRecoilPitch * cos(2.5 * (i) / pm->pmext->weapRecoilDuration);
3107  muzzlebounce[PITCH] -= 0.25f * random() * (1.0f - (i) / pm->pmext->weapRecoilDuration);
3108  }
3109 
3110  if (pm->pmext->weapRecoilYaw > 0.f)
3111  {
3112  muzzlebounce[YAW] += 0.5 * pm->pmext->weapRecoilYaw * cos(1.0 - (i) * 3 / pm->pmext->weapRecoilDuration);
3113  muzzlebounce[YAW] += 0.5f * crandom() * (1.0f - (i) / pm->pmext->weapRecoilDuration);
3114  }
3115  }
3116 
3117  // set the delta angle
3118  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
3119  {
3120  cmdAngle = ANGLE2SHORT(muzzlebounce[i]);
3121  pm->ps->delta_angles[i] = cmdAngle - pm->cmd.angles[i];
3122  }
3123  VectorCopy(muzzlebounce, pm->ps->viewangles);
3124 
3125  if (deltaTime == pm->pmext->weapRecoilDuration)
3126  {
3127  pm->pmext->weapRecoilTime = 0;
3128  pm->pmext->lastRecoilDeltaTime = 0;
3129  }
3130  else
3131  {
3132  pm->pmext->lastRecoilDeltaTime = deltaTime;
3133  }
3134  }
3135 }
3136

3142 static void PM_Weapon(void)
3143 {
3144  int addTime = GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->nextShotTime;
3145  int aimSpreadScaleAdd = GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->aimSpreadScaleAdd;
3146  qboolean delayedFire = qfalse; // true if the delay time has just expired and this is the frame to send the fire event
3147  int weapattackanim;
3148  qboolean akimboFire;
3149 #ifdef DO_WEAPON_DBG

3151 #endif
3152 
3153  // don't allow attack until all buttons are up
3154  if (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_RESPAWNED)
3155  {
3156  return;
3157  }
3158 
3159  // ignore if spectator
3160  if (pm->ps->persistant[PERS_TEAM] == TEAM_SPECTATOR)
3161  {
3162  return;
3163  }
3164

3167  {

3170  // weapon cool down

3172  }
3173 
3174  return;
3175  }
3176 
3177  // weapon cool down
3178  PM_CoolWeapons();
3179 
3180  // mounted mg42 handling
3181  if (PM_MountedFire())
3182  {
3183  return;
3184  }
3185 
3186  // commented - why do we do this in weapon code? This messes up water content type
3187  // only PM_SetWaterLevel and init functions should deal with this
3188  // if we have issues with water we know why ....
3189  //pm->watertype = 0;

3198  }

3200 #ifdef DO_WEAPON_DBG

3207 #endif

3209  {
3210  case WEAPON_READY:
3211  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_READY\n");
3212  break;
3213  case WEAPON_RAISING:
3214  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_RAISING\n");
3215  break;
3216  case WEAPON_RAISING_TORELOAD:
3217  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_RAISING_TORELOAD\n");
3218  break;
3219  case WEAPON_DROPPING:
3220  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_DROPPING\n");
3221  break;

3223  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_READYING\n");
3224  break;
3225  case WEAPON_RELAXING:
3226  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_RELAXING\n");
3227  break;
3228  case WEAPON_DROPPING_TORELOAD:
3229  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_DROPPING_TORELOAD\n");
3230  break;
3231  case WEAPON_FIRING:
3232  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_FIRING\n");
3233  break;

3235  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_FIRINGALT\n");
3236  break;
