3238  Com_Printf(" -- WEAPON_RELOADING\n");
3239  break;
3240  }
3241  weaponstate_last = pm->ps->weaponstate;
3242  }
3243 #endif
3244 
3245  // check for weapon recoil
3246  // do the recoil before setting the values, that way it will be shown next frame and not this
3247  PM_HandleRecoil();
3248 
3249  if (PM_CheckGrenade())
3250  {
3251  return;
3252  }
3253 
3254  if (pm->ps->weaponDelay > 0)
3255  {
3256  pm->ps->weaponDelay -= pml.msec;
3257 
3258  if (pm->ps->weaponDelay <= 0)
3259  {
3260  pm->ps->weaponDelay = 0;
3261  delayedFire = qtrue; // weapon delay has expired. Fire this frame
3262  }
3263  }
3264 
3265  //if (pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_RELAXING)
3266  //{
3267  // pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_READY;
3268  // return;
3269  //}
3270 
3271  // make weapon function
3272  if (pm->ps->weaponTime > 0)
3273  {
3274  pm->ps->weaponTime -= pml.msec;
3275  if (!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK) && pm->ps->weaponTime < 0)
3276  {
3277  pm->ps->weaponTime = 0;
3278  }
3279 
3280  // aha, THIS is the kewl quick fire mode :)
3281  // added back for multiplayer pistol balancing
3282  if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->firingMode & WEAPON_FIRING_MODE_SEMI_AUTOMATIC)
3283  {
3284  // moved releasedFire into pmext instead of ps
3285  if (pm->pmext->releasedFire)
3286  {
3287  if (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK)
3288  {
3289  // akimbo weapons only have a 200ms delay, so
3290  // use a shorter time for quickfire (#255)

3294  {
3295  pm->ps->weaponTime = 0;
3296  }

3299  {
3300  if (pm->ps->weaponTime <= 150)
3301  {
3302  pm->ps->weaponTime = 0;
3303  }
3304  }
3305  }
3306  }
3307  else if (!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK))
3308  {
3309  // moved releasedFire into pmext instead of ps
3310  pm->pmext->releasedFire = qtrue;
3311  }
3312  }
3313  }
3314 
3315  // check for weapon change
3316  // can't change if weapon is firing, but can change
3317  // again if lowering or raising
3318  if ((pm->ps->weaponTime <= 0 || (!weaponstateFiring && pm->ps->weaponDelay <= 0)) && !delayedFire)
3319  {
3320  if (pm->ps->weapon != pm->cmd.weapon)
3321  {
3322  PM_BeginWeaponChange(pm->ps->weapon, pm->cmd.weapon, qfalse);
3323  }

3327  if (pm->ps->weaponDelay > 0)
3328  {
3329  return;
3330  }
3331 
3332  // check for clip change
3333  PM_CheckForReload(pm->ps->weapon);
3334 
3335  // check if weapon is busy
3336  if (pm->ps->weaponTime > 0 || pm->ps->weaponDelay > 0)
3337  {
3338  return;
3339  }
3340 
3341  switch (pm->ps->weaponstate)
3342  {
3343  case WEAPON_RELOADING:
3344  PM_FinishWeaponReload();
3345  break;
3346  case WEAPON_DROPPING:
3347  case WEAPON_DROPPING_TORELOAD:

3349  return;

3352  PM_StartWeaponAnim(PM_IdleAnimForWeapon(pm->ps->weapon));
3353  return;

3355  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_READY;
3356  PM_BeginWeaponReload(pm->ps->weapon);
3357  return;
3358  default:
3359  break;
3360  }
3361 
3362  // can't shoot while prone and moving
3363  if ((pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE_MOVING) && !delayedFire)
3364  {
3365  PM_ContinueWeaponAnim(PM_IdleAnimForWeapon(pm->ps->weapon));
3366  return;
3367  }
3368 
3369  // this is possible since the player starts with nothing
3370  if (pm->ps->weapon == WP_NONE)
3371  {
3372  return;
3373  }
3374 
3375  if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PANZER)
3376  {
3377  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
3378  {
3379  return;
3380  }
3381  }
3382 
3383  // a not mounted mortar can't fire
3384  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->type, (WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SETTABLE)))
3385  {
3386  return;
3387  }
3388 
3389  // check for fire
3390  // if not on fire button and there's not a delayed shot this frame...
3391  // consider also leaning, with delayed attack reset
3392  if ((!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK) && !(pm->cmd.wbuttons & WBUTTON_ATTACK2) && !delayedFire) ||
3393  (pm->ps->leanf != 0.f && !GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->grenadeTime))
3394  {

3396  pm->ps->weaponDelay = 0;
3397 
3398  if (weaponstateFiring) // you were just firing, time to relax
3399  {
3400  PM_ContinueWeaponAnim(PM_IdleAnimForWeapon(pm->ps->weapon));
3401  }
3402 
3403  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_READY;
3404  return;
3405  }
3406 
3407  // don't allow some weapons to fire if charge bar isn't full
3408  if (GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_CHARGE_TIME)
3409  {
3410  skillType_t skill = GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->skillBased;
3411  float coeff = GetWeaponTableData(pm->ps->weapon)->chargeTimeCoeff[pm->skill[skill]];
3412  int chargeTime;
3413 
3414  switch (skill)
3415  {
3416  case SK_EXPLOSIVES_AND_CONSTRUCTION: chargeTime = pm->engineerChargeTime; break;
3417  case SK_FIRST_AID: chargeTime = pm->medicChargeTime; break;
3418  case SK_SIGNALS: chargeTime = pm->ltChargeTime; break;
3419  case SK_HEAVY_WEAPONS: chargeTime = pm->soldierChargeTime; break;
3420  case SK_MILITARY_INTELLIGENCE_AND_SCOPED_WEAPONS: chargeTime = pm->covertopsChargeTime; break;
3421  case SK_BATTLE_SENSE:
3422  case SK_LIGHT_WEAPONS:
3423  case SK_NUM_SKILLS:
3424  default: chargeTime = -1; break;
3425  }
3426 
3427  if (chargeTime != -1)
3428  {
3429  // check if there is enough charge to fire
3430  if (pm->cmd.serverTime - pm->ps->classWeaponTime < chargeTime * coeff)
3431  {
3432  if ((pm->ps->weapon == WP_MEDKIT || pm->ps->weapon == WP_AMMO) && (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK))
3433  {
3434  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_NOPOWER, qtrue, qfalse);
3435  }
3436 
3437  return;
3438  }
3439 
3440  // ready to fire, handle the charge time
3441  if (weaponstateFiring)
3442  {
3443  if (coeff != 1.f)
3444  {
3445  if (pm->cmd.serverTime - pm->ps->classWeaponTime > chargeTime)
3446  {
3447  pm->ps->classWeaponTime = pm->cmd.serverTime - chargeTime;
3448  }
3449 
3450  pm->ps->classWeaponTime += coeff * chargeTime;
3451  }
3452  else
3453  {
3454  pm->ps->classWeaponTime = pm->cmd.serverTime;
3455  }
3456  }
3457  }
3458  }
3459 
3460  // player is zooming or using binocular - no fire
3461  // PC_FIELDOPS needs to zoom to call artillery
3462  if ((pm->ps->eFlags & EF_ZOOMING) || pm->ps->weapon == WP_BINOCULARS)
3463  {
3464 #ifdef GAMEDLL
3465  if (pm->ps->stats[STAT_PLAYER_CLASS] == PC_FIELDOPS)
3466  {

3795 static void PM_DropTimers(void)
3796 {
3797  // drop misc timing counter
3798  if (pm->ps->pm_time)
3799  {
3800  if (pml.msec >= pm->ps->pm_time)
3801  {
3802  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_ALL_TIMES;
3803  pm->ps->pm_time = 0;
3804  }
3805  else
3806  {
3807  pm->ps->pm_time -= pml.msec;
3808  }
3809  }
3810 
3811  // drop animation counter
3812  if (pm->ps->legsTimer > 0)
3813  {
3814  pm->ps->legsTimer -= pml.msec;
3815  if (pm->ps->legsTimer < 0)
3816  {
3817  pm->ps->legsTimer = 0;
3818  }
3819  }
3820 
3821  if (pm->ps->torsoTimer > 0)
3822  {
3823  pm->ps->torsoTimer -= pml.msec;
3824  if (pm->ps->torsoTimer < 0)
3825  {
3826  pm->ps->torsoTimer = 0;
3827  }
3828  }
3829 }

3831 #define LEAN_MAX 28.0f
3832 #define LEAN_TIME_TO 200.0f // time to get to/from full lean
3833 #define LEAN_TIME_FR 300.0f // time to get to/from full lean
3834 
3841 void PM_UpdateLean(playerState_t *ps, usercmd_t *cmd, pmove_t *tpm)
3842 {
3843  vec3_t start, tmins, tmaxs, right, end;
3844  vec3_t viewangles;
3845  trace_t trace;
3846  int leaning = 0; // -1 left, 1 right
3847  float leanofs = ps->leanf;
3848 
3849  if (cmd->wbuttons & (WBUTTON_LEANLEFT | WBUTTON_LEANRIGHT))
3850  {
3851  if (ps->pm_type == PM_SPECTATOR || // allow spectators to lean while moving
3852  ((!cmd->forwardmove && cmd->upmove <= 0) && // not allow to lean while moving
3853  !BG_PlayerMounted(ps->eFlags) && // not allow to lean while on mg42
3854  !(ps->eFlags & EF_FIRING) && // not allow to lean while firing
3855  !(ps->eFlags & EF_DEAD) && // not allow to lean while dead
3856  !(ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE) && // not allow to lean while prone
3857  !(ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_FIRING && ps->weapon == WP_DYNAMITE) && // don't allow to lean while tossing dynamite. NOTE: ATVI Wolfenstein Misc #479 - initial fix to #270 would crash in g_synchronousClients 1 situation
3858  !CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(ps->weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))) // not allow to lean while mortar set
3859  {
3860  // if both are pressed, result is no lean
3861  if (cmd->wbuttons & WBUTTON_LEANLEFT)
3862  {
3863  leaning -= 1;
3864  }
3865 
3866  if (cmd->wbuttons & WBUTTON_LEANRIGHT)
3867  {
3868  leaning += 1;
3869  }
3870  }
3871  }
3872 
3873  if (!leaning) // go back to center position
3874  {
3875  if (leanofs > 0) // right
3876  {
3877  leanofs -= (((float)pml.msec / (float)LEAN_TIME_FR) * LEAN_MAX);
3878  if (leanofs < 0)
3879  {
3880  leanofs = 0;
3881  }
3882 
3883  ps->leanf = leanofs;
3884  }
3885  else if (leanofs < 0) // left
3886  {
3887  leanofs += (((float)pml.msec / (float)LEAN_TIME_FR) * LEAN_MAX);
3888  if (leanofs > 0)
3889  {
3890  leanofs = 0;
3891  }
3892 
3893  ps->leanf = leanofs;
3894  }
3895 
3896  ps->stats[STAT_PS_FLAGS] &= ~(STAT_LEAN_LEFT | STAT_LEAN_RIGHT);
3897 
3898  return; // also early return if already in center position
3899  }
3900  else if (leaning > 0) // right
3901  {
3902  if (leanofs < LEAN_MAX)
3903  {
3904  leanofs += (((float)pml.msec / (float)LEAN_TIME_TO) * LEAN_MAX);
3905  }
3906 
3907  if (leanofs > LEAN_MAX)
3908  {
3909  leanofs = LEAN_MAX;
3910  }
3911 
3912  ps->stats[STAT_PS_FLAGS] |= STAT_LEAN_RIGHT;
3913  }
3914  else // left
3915  {
3916  if (leanofs > -LEAN_MAX)
3917  {
3918  leanofs -= (((float)pml.msec / (float)LEAN_TIME_TO) * LEAN_MAX);
3919  }
3920 
3921  if (leanofs < -LEAN_MAX)
3922  {
3923  leanofs = -LEAN_MAX;
3924  }
3925 
3926  ps->stats[STAT_PS_FLAGS] |= STAT_LEAN_LEFT;
3927  }
3928 
3929  VectorCopy(ps->origin, start);
3930  start[2] += ps->viewheight;
3931 
3932  VectorCopy(ps->viewangles, viewangles);
3933  viewangles[ROLL] += leanofs / 2.0f;
3934  AngleVectors(viewangles, NULL, right, NULL);
3935  VectorMA(start, leanofs, right, end);
3936 
3937  VectorSet(tmins, -8, -8, -7); // NOTE: ATVI Wolfenstein Misc #472, bumped from -4 to cover gun clipping issue
3938  VectorSet(tmaxs, 8, 8, 4);
3939 
3940  if (pm)
3941  {
3942  pm->trace(&trace, start, tmins, tmaxs, end, ps->clientNum, MASK_PLAYERSOLID);
3943  }
3944  else
3945  {
3946  tpm->trace(&trace, start, tmins, tmaxs, end, ps->clientNum, MASK_PLAYERSOLID);
3947  }
3948 
3949  ps->leanf = leanofs * trace.fraction;
3950 
3951  // Allow Spectators to lean while moving
3952  if (ps->leanf != 0.f && ps->pm_type != PM_SPECTATOR)
3953  {
3954  cmd->rightmove = 0; // also disallowed in cl_input ~391
3955  }
3956 }

3971 void PM_UpdateViewAngles(playerState_t *ps, pmoveExt_t *pmext, usercmd_t *cmd, void (trace) (trace_t *results, const vec3_t start, const vec3_t mins, const vec3_t maxs, const vec3_t end, int passEntityNum, int contentMask), int tracemask) // modified
3972 {
3973  short temp;
3974  int i;
3975  vec3_t oldViewAngles;
3976 
3977  // Added support for PMF_TIME_LOCKPLAYER
3978  if (ps->pm_type == PM_INTERMISSION || (ps->pm_flags & PMF_TIME_LOCKPLAYER))
3979  {
3980  // reset all angle changes, so it does not suddenly happens after unlocked
3981  ps->delta_angles[0] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[0]) - cmd->angles[0];
3982  ps->delta_angles[1] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[1]) - cmd->angles[1];
3983  ps->delta_angles[2] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[2]) - cmd->angles[2];
3984  return; // no view changes at all
3985  }
3986 
3987  if (ps->pm_type != PM_SPECTATOR && ps->stats[STAT_HEALTH] <= 0)
3988  {
3989  // Allow players to look around while 'wounded' or lock to a medic if nearby
3990  temp = cmd->angles[1] + ps->delta_angles[1];
3991  // always allow this. viewlocking will take precedence
3992  // if a medic is found
3993  // using a full short and converting on the client so that
3994  // we get >1 degree resolution
3995  ps->stats[STAT_DEAD_YAW] = temp;
3996  return; // no view changes at all
3997  }
3998 
3999  VectorCopy(ps->viewangles, oldViewAngles);
4000 
4001  // circularly clamp the angles with deltas
4002  // - game-side delta_angles modifications are broken here if you exclude the ROLL calculation
4003  for (i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++)
4004  {
4005  temp = cmd->angles[i] + ps->delta_angles[i];
4006  if (i == PITCH)
4007  {
4008  // don't let the player look up or down more than 90 degrees
4009  if (temp > 16000)
4010  {
4011  ps->delta_angles[i] = 16000 - cmd->angles[i];
4012  temp = 16000;
4013  }
4014  else if (temp < -16000)
4015  {
4016  ps->delta_angles[i] = -16000 - cmd->angles[i];
4017  temp = -16000;
4018  }
4019  }
4020  ps->viewangles[i] = SHORT2ANGLE(temp);
4021  }
4022 
4023  if (BG_PlayerMounted(ps->eFlags))
4024  {
4025  float arcMin, arcMax, arcDiff;
4026  float yaw = ps->viewangles[YAW];
4027  float oldYaw = oldViewAngles[YAW];
4028 
4029  if (yaw - oldYaw > 180)
4030  {
4031  yaw -= 360;
4032  }
4033  if (yaw - oldYaw < -180)
4034  {
4035  yaw += 360;
4036  }
4037 
4038  if (yaw > oldYaw)
4039  {
4040  if (yaw - oldYaw > MG42_YAWSPEED * pml.frametime)
4041  {
4042  ps->viewangles[YAW] = oldYaw + MG42_YAWSPEED * pml.frametime;
4043 
4044  // Set delta_angles properly
4045  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4046  }
4047  }
4048  else if (oldYaw > yaw)
4049  {
4050  if (oldYaw - yaw > MG42_YAWSPEED * pml.frametime)
4051  {
4052  ps->viewangles[YAW] = oldYaw - MG42_YAWSPEED * pml.frametime;
4053 
4054  // Set delta_angles properly
4055  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4056  }
4057  }
4058 
4059  // limit harc and varc
4060 
4061  // pitch (varc)
4062  arcMax = pmext->varc;
4063  if (ps->eFlags & EF_AAGUN_ACTIVE)
4064  {
4065  arcMin = 0;
4066  }
4067  else if (ps->eFlags & EF_MOUNTEDTANK)
4068  {
4069  float angle;
4070 
4071  arcMin = 14;
4072  arcMax = 50;
4073 
4074  angle = cos(DEG2RAD(AngleNormalize180(pmext->centerangles[1] - ps->viewangles[1])));
4075  angle = -AngleNormalize360(angle * AngleNormalize180(0 - pmext->centerangles[0]));
4076 
4077  pmext->centerangles[PITCH] = angle;
4078  }
4079  else
4080  {
4081  arcMin = pmext->varc / 2;
4082  }
4083 
4084  arcDiff = AngleNormalize180(ps->viewangles[PITCH] - pmext->centerangles[PITCH]);
4085 
4086  if (arcDiff > arcMin)
4087  {
4088  ps->viewangles[PITCH] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->centerangles[PITCH] + arcMin);
4089 
4090  // Set delta_angles properly
4091  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[PITCH]) - cmd->angles[PITCH];
4092  }
4093  else if (arcDiff < -arcMax)
4094  {
4095  ps->viewangles[PITCH] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->centerangles[PITCH] - arcMax);
4096 
4097  // Set delta_angles properly
4098  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[PITCH]) - cmd->angles[PITCH];
4099  }
4100 
4101  if (!(ps->eFlags & EF_MOUNTEDTANK))
4102  {
4103  // yaw (harc)
4104  arcMin = arcMax = pmext->harc;
4105  arcDiff = AngleNormalize180(ps->viewangles[YAW] - pmext->centerangles[YAW]);
4106 
4107  if (arcDiff > arcMin)
4108  {
4109  ps->viewangles[YAW] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->centerangles[YAW] + arcMin);
4110 
4111  // Set delta_angles properly
4112  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4113  }
4114  else if (arcDiff < -arcMax)
4115  {
4116  ps->viewangles[YAW] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->centerangles[YAW] - arcMax);
4117 
4118  // Set delta_angles properly
4119  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4120  }
4121  }
4122  }
4123  else if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(ps->weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
4124  {
4125  float degsSec = 60.f;
4126  float pitch, oldPitch;
4127  float pitchMax = 30.f;
4128  float yawDiff, pitchDiff;
4129  float yaw = ps->viewangles[YAW];
4130  float oldYaw = oldViewAngles[YAW];
4131 
4132  if (yaw - oldYaw > 180)
4133  {
4134  yaw -= 360;
4135  }
4136  if (yaw - oldYaw < -180)
4137  {
4138  yaw += 360;
4139  }
4140 
4141  if (yaw > oldYaw)
4142  {
4143  if (yaw - oldYaw > degsSec * pml.frametime)
4144  {
4145  ps->viewangles[YAW] = oldYaw + degsSec * pml.frametime;
4146 
4147  // Set delta_angles properly
4148  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4149  }
4150  }
4151  else if (oldYaw > yaw)
4152  {
4153  if (oldYaw - yaw > degsSec * pml.frametime)
4154  {
4155  ps->viewangles[YAW] = oldYaw - degsSec * pml.frametime;
4156 
4157  // Set delta_angles properly
4158  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4159  }
4160  }
4161 
4162  pitch = ps->viewangles[PITCH];
4163  oldPitch = oldViewAngles[PITCH];
4164 
4165  if (pitch - oldPitch > 180)
4166  {
4167  pitch -= 360;
4168  }
4169  if (pitch - oldPitch < -180)
4170  {
4171  pitch += 360;
4172  }
4173 
4174  if (pitch > oldPitch)
4175  {
4176  if (pitch - oldPitch > degsSec * pml.frametime)
4177  {
4178  ps->viewangles[PITCH] = oldPitch + degsSec * pml.frametime;
4179 
4180  // Set delta_angles properly
4181  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[PITCH]) - cmd->angles[PITCH];
4182  }
4183  }
4184  else if (oldPitch > pitch)
4185  {
4186  if (oldPitch - pitch > degsSec * pml.frametime)
4187  {
4188  ps->viewangles[PITCH] = oldPitch - degsSec * pml.frametime;
4189 
4190  // Set delta_angles properly
4191  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[PITCH]) - cmd->angles[PITCH];
4192  }
4193  }
4194 
4195  // yaw
4196  yawDiff = ps->viewangles[YAW] - pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[YAW];
4197 
4198  if (yawDiff > 180)
4199  {
4200  yawDiff -= 360;
4201  }
4202  else if (yawDiff < -180)
4203  {
4204  yawDiff += 360;
4205  }
4206 
4207  if (yawDiff > 30)
4208  {
4209  ps->viewangles[YAW] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[YAW] + 30.f);
4210 
4211  // Set delta_angles properly
4212  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4213  }
4214  else if (yawDiff < -30)
4215  {
4216  ps->viewangles[YAW] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[YAW] - 30.f);
4217 
4218  // Set delta_angles properly
4219  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4220  }
4221 
4222  // pitch
4223  pitchDiff = ps->viewangles[PITCH] - pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[PITCH];
4224 
4225  if (pitchDiff > 180)
4226  {
4227  pitchDiff -= 360;
4228  }
4229  else if (pitchDiff < -180)
4230  {
4231  pitchDiff += 360;
4232  }
4233 
4234  if (pitchDiff > (pitchMax - 10.f))
4235  {
4236  ps->viewangles[PITCH] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[PITCH] + (pitchMax - 10.f));
4237 
4238  // Set delta_angles properly
4239  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[PITCH]) - cmd->angles[PITCH];
4240  }
4241  else if (pitchDiff < -(pitchMax))
4242  {
4243  ps->viewangles[PITCH] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[PITCH] - (pitchMax));
4244 
4245  // Set delta_angles properly
4246  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[PITCH]) - cmd->angles[PITCH];
4247  }
4248  }
4249  else if (ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
4250  {
4251  //float degsSec = 60.f;
4252  //float oldYaw;
4253  trace_t traceres; // renamed
4254  int newDeltaAngle = ps->delta_angles[YAW];
4255  float pitchMax = 40.f;
4256  float pitchDiff;
4257  float oldYaw = oldViewAngles[YAW];
4258  //yaw = ps->viewangles[YAW];
4259 
4260 
4261  /*if ( yaw - oldYaw > 180 ) {
4262  yaw -= 360;
4263  }
4264  if ( yaw - oldYaw < -180 ) {
4265  yaw += 360;
4266  }
4267 
4268  if( yaw > oldYaw ) {
4269  if( yaw - oldYaw > degsSec * pml.frametime ) {
4270  ps->viewangles[YAW] = oldYaw + degsSec * pml.frametime;
4271 
4272  // Set delta_angles properly
4273  newDeltaAngle = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4274  }
4275  } else if( oldYaw > yaw ) {
4276  if( oldYaw - yaw > degsSec * pml.frametime ) {
4277  ps->viewangles[YAW] = oldYaw - degsSec * pml.frametime;
4278 
4279  // Set delta_angles properly
4280  newDeltaAngle = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4281  }
4282  }*/
4283 
4284  // Check if we are allowed to rotate to there
4285  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(ps->weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MG | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
4286  {
4287  float yawDiff;
4288 
4289  pitchMax = 20.f;
4290 
4291  // yaw
4292  yawDiff = ps->viewangles[YAW] - pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[YAW];
4293 
4294  if (yawDiff > 180)
4295  {
4296  yawDiff -= 360;
4297  }
4298  else if (yawDiff < -180)
4299  {
4300  yawDiff += 360;
4301  }
4302 
4303  if (yawDiff > 20)
4304  {
4305  ps->viewangles[YAW] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[YAW] + 20.f);
4306 
4307  // Set delta_angles properly
4308  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4309  }
4310  else if (yawDiff < -20)
4311  {
4312  ps->viewangles[YAW] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[YAW] - 20.f);
4313 
4314  // Set delta_angles properly
4315  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4316  }
4317  }
4318 
4319  // pitch
4320  pitchDiff = ps->viewangles[PITCH] - pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[PITCH];
4321 
4322  if (pitchDiff > 180)
4323  {
4324  pitchDiff -= 360;
4325  }
4326  else if (pitchDiff < -180)
4327  {
4328  pitchDiff += 360;
4329  }
4330 
4331  if (pitchDiff > pitchMax)
4332  {
4333  ps->viewangles[PITCH] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[PITCH] + pitchMax);
4334 
4335  // Set delta_angles properly
4336  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[PITCH]) - cmd->angles[PITCH];
4337  }
4338  else if (pitchDiff < -pitchMax)
4339  {
4340  ps->viewangles[PITCH] = AngleNormalize180(pmext->mountedWeaponAngles[PITCH] - pitchMax);
4341 
4342  // Set delta_angles properly
4343  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[PITCH]) - cmd->angles[PITCH];
4344  }
4345 
4346  // Check if we rotated into a wall with our legs, if so, undo yaw
4347  if (ps->viewangles[YAW] != oldYaw)
4348  {
4349  // see if we have the space to go prone
4350  // we know our main body isn't in a solid, check for our legs
4351 
4352  // bugfix - use supplied trace - pm may not be set
4353  PM_TraceLegs(&traceres, &pmext->proneLegsOffset, ps->origin, ps->origin, NULL, ps->viewangles, pm->trace, ps->clientNum, tracemask);
4354 
4355  if (traceres.allsolid /* && trace.entityNum >= MAX_CLIENTS */)
4356  {
4357  // starting in a solid, no space
4358  ps->viewangles[YAW] = oldYaw;
4359  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[YAW]) - cmd->angles[YAW];
4360  }
4361  else
4362  {
4363  // all fine
4364  ps->delta_angles[YAW] = newDeltaAngle;
4365  }
4366  }
4367  }
4368 }

4370 qboolean ladderforward;
4371 vec3_t laddervec;
4372 
4373 #define TRACE_LADDER_DIST 48.0
4374 
4378 void PM_CheckLadderMove(void)
4379 {
4380  vec3_t spot;
4381  vec3_t flatforward;
4382  trace_t trace;
4383  float tracedist;
4384  qboolean wasOnLadder;
4385 
4386  if (pm->ps->pm_time)
4387  {
4388  return;
4389  }
4390 
4391  if (pml.walking)
4392  {
4393  tracedist = 1.0;
4394  }
4395  else
4396  {
4397  tracedist = TRACE_LADDER_DIST;
4398  }
4399 
4400  wasOnLadder = ((pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_LADDER) != 0);
4401 
4402  pml.ladder = qfalse;
4403  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_LADDER; // clear ladder bit
4404  ladderforward = qfalse;
4405 
4406  if (pm->ps->stats[STAT_HEALTH] <= 0)
4407  {
4408  pm->ps->groundEntityNum = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
4409  pml.groundPlane = qfalse;
4410  pml.walking = qfalse;
4411  return;
4412  }
4413 
4414  // Can't climb ladders while prone
4415  if (pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE)
4416  {
4417  return;
4418  }
4419 
4420  // check for ladder
4421  flatforward[0] = pml.forward[0];
4422  flatforward[1] = pml.forward[1];
4423  flatforward[2] = 0;
4424  VectorNormalize(flatforward);
4425 
4426  VectorMA(pm->ps->origin, tracedist, flatforward, spot);
4427  pm->trace(&trace, pm->ps->origin, pm->mins, pm->maxs, spot, pm->ps->clientNum, pm->tracemask);
4428  if ((trace.fraction < 1) && (trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_LADDER))
4429  {
4430  pml.ladder = qtrue;
4431  }
4432 
4433  if (pml.ladder)
4434  {
4435  VectorCopy(trace.plane.normal, laddervec);
4436  }
4437 
4438  if (pml.ladder && !pml.walking && (trace.fraction * tracedist > 1.0f))
4439  {
4440  vec3_t mins;
4441  // if we are only just on the ladder, don't do this yet, or it may throw us back off the ladder
4442  pml.ladder = qfalse;
4443  VectorCopy(pm->mins, mins);
4444  mins[2] = -1;
4445  VectorMA(pm->ps->origin, -tracedist, laddervec, spot);
4446  pm->trace(&trace, pm->ps->origin, mins, pm->maxs, spot, pm->ps->clientNum, pm->tracemask);
4447  if ((trace.fraction < 1) && (trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_LADDER))
4448  {
4449  ladderforward = qtrue;
4450  pml.ladder = qtrue;
4451  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_LADDER; // set ladder bit
4452  }
4453  else
4454  {
4455  pml.ladder = qfalse;
4456  }
4457  }
4458  else if (pml.ladder)
4459  {
4460  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_LADDER; // set ladder bit
4461  }
4462 
4463  // create some up/down velocity if touching ladder
4464  if (pml.ladder)
4465  {
4466  if (pml.walking)
4467  {
4468  // we are currently on the ground, only go up and prevent X/Y if we are pushing forwards
4469  if (pm->cmd.forwardmove <= 0)
4470  {
4471  pml.ladder = qfalse;
4472  }
4473  }
4474  }
4475 
4476  // if we have just dismounted the ladder at the top, play dismount
4477  if (!pml.ladder && wasOnLadder && pm->ps->velocity[2] > 0)
4478  {
4479  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_CLIMB_DISMOUNT, qfalse, qfalse);
4480  }
4481  // if we have just mounted the ladder
4482  if (pml.ladder && !wasOnLadder && pm->ps->velocity[2] < 0) // only play anim if going down ladder
4483  {
4484  BG_AnimScriptEvent(pm->ps, pm->character->animModelInfo, ANIM_ET_CLIMB_MOUNT, qfalse, qfalse);
4485  }
4486 }
4487 
4491 void PM_LadderMove(void)
4492 {
4493  float wishspeed, scale;
4494  vec3_t wishdir, wishvel;
4495  float upscale;
4496 
4497  if (ladderforward)
4498  {
4499  // move towards the ladder
4500  VectorScale(laddervec, -200.0, wishvel);
4501  pm->ps->velocity[0] = wishvel[0];
4502  pm->ps->velocity[1] = wishvel[1];
4503  }
4504 
4505  upscale = (pml.forward[2] + 0.5f) * 2.5f;
4506  if (upscale > 1.0f)
4507  {
4508  upscale = 1.0f;
4509  }
4510  else if (upscale < -1.0f)
4511  {
4512  upscale = -1.0f;
4513  }
4514 
4515  // forward/right should be horizontal only
4516  pml.forward[2] = 0;
4517  pml.right[2] = 0;
4518  VectorNormalize(pml.forward);
4519  VectorNormalize(pml.right);
4520 
4521  // move depending on the view, if view is straight forward, then go up
4522  // if view is down more then X degrees, start going down
4523  // if they are back pedalling, then go in reverse of above
4524  scale = PM_CmdScale(&pm->cmd);
4525  VectorClear(wishvel);
4526 
4527  if (pm->cmd.forwardmove)
4528  {
4529  wishvel[2] = 0.9f * upscale * scale * (float)pm->cmd.forwardmove;
4530  }
4531  //Com_Printf("wishvel[2] = %i, fwdmove = %i\n", (int)wishvel[2], (int)pm->cmd.forwardmove );
4532 
4533  if (pm->cmd.rightmove)
4534  {
4535  // strafe, so we can jump off ladder
4536  vec3_t ladder_right, ang;
4537  vectoangles(laddervec, ang);
4538  AngleVectors(ang, NULL, ladder_right, NULL);
4539 
4540  // if we are looking away from the ladder, reverse the right vector
4541  if (DotProduct(laddervec, pml.forward) < 0)
4542  {
4543  VectorInverse(ladder_right);
4544  }
4545 
4546  //VectorMA( wishvel, 0.5 * scale * (float)pm->cmd.rightmove, pml.right, wishvel );
4547  VectorMA(wishvel, 0.5f * scale * (float)pm->cmd.rightmove, ladder_right, wishvel);
4548  }
4549 
4550  // do strafe friction
4551  PM_Friction();
4552 
4553  if (pm->ps->velocity[0] < 1 && pm->ps->velocity[0] > -1)
4554  {
4555  pm->ps->velocity[0] = 0;
4556  }
4557  if (pm->ps->velocity[1] < 1 && pm->ps->velocity[1] > -1)
4558  {
4559  pm->ps->velocity[1] = 0;
4560  }
4561 
4562  wishspeed = VectorNormalize2(wishvel, wishdir);
4563 
4564  PM_Accelerate(wishdir, wishspeed, pm_accelerate);
4565  if (wishvel[2] == 0.f)
4566  {
4567  if (pm->ps->velocity[2] > 0)
4568  {
4569  pm->ps->velocity[2] -= pm->ps->gravity * pml.frametime;
4570  if (pm->ps->velocity[2] < 0)
4571  {
4572  pm->ps->velocity[2] = 0;
4573  }
4574  }
4575  else
4576  {
4577  pm->ps->velocity[2] += pm->ps->gravity * pml.frametime;
4578  if (pm->ps->velocity[2] > 0)
4579  {
4580  pm->ps->velocity[2] = 0;
4581  }
4582  }
4583  }
4584 
4585  //Com_Printf("vel[2] = %i\n", (int)pm->ps->velocity[2] );
4586 
4587  PM_StepSlideMove(qfalse); // no gravity while going up ladder
4588 
4589  // always point legs forward
4590  pm->ps->movementDir = 0;
4591 }
4592 
4596 void PM_Sprint(void)
4597 {
4598  if (pm->waterlevel <= 1) // no sprint & no stamina recharge under water
4599  {
4600  if ((pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_SPRINT) && (pm->cmd.forwardmove || pm->cmd.rightmove) && !(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_DUCKED) && !(pm->ps->eFlags & EF_PRONE))
4601  {
4602  if (pm->ps->powerups[PW_ADRENALINE])
4603  {
4604  pm->pmext->sprintTime = SPRINTTIME;
4605  }
4606  else if (pm->ps->powerups[PW_NOFATIGUE])
4607  {
4608  // take time from powerup before taking it from sprintTime
4609  pm->ps->powerups[PW_NOFATIGUE] -= 50;
4610 
4611  // go ahead and continue to recharge stamina at double
4612  // rate with stamina powerup even when exerting
4613  pm->pmext->sprintTime += 10;
4614  if (pm->pmext->sprintTime > SPRINTTIME)
4615  {
4616  pm->pmext->sprintTime = SPRINTTIME;
4617  }
4618 
4619  if (pm->ps->powerups[PW_NOFATIGUE] < 0)
4620  {
4621  pm->ps->powerups[PW_NOFATIGUE] = 0;
4622  }
4623  }
4624  // sprint time tuned for multiplayer
4625  else
4626  {
4627  // adjusted for framerate independence
4628  pm->pmext->sprintTime -= 5000 * pml.frametime;
4629  }
4630 
4631  if (pm->pmext->sprintTime < 0)
4632  {
4633  pm->pmext->sprintTime = 0;
4634  }
4635 
4636  if (!pm->ps->sprintExertTime)
4637  {
4638  pm->ps->sprintExertTime = 1;
4639  }
4640  }
4641  else
4642  {
4643  // in multiplayer, recharge faster for top 75% of sprint bar
4644  // (for people that *just* use it for jumping, not sprint) this code was
4645  // mucked about with to eliminate client-side framerate-dependancy in wolf single player
4646  if (pm->ps->powerups[PW_ADRENALINE])
4647  {
4648  pm->pmext->sprintTime = SPRINTTIME;
4649  }
4650  else if (pm->ps->powerups[PW_NOFATIGUE]) // recharge at 2x with stamina powerup
4651  {
4652  pm->pmext->sprintTime += 10;
4653  }
4654  else
4655  {
4656  int rechargebase = 500;
4657 
4658  if (pm->skill[SK_BATTLE_SENSE] >= 2)
4659  {
4660  rechargebase *= 1.6f;
4661  }
4662 
4663  pm->pmext->sprintTime += rechargebase * pml.frametime; // adjusted for framerate independence
4664  if (pm->pmext->sprintTime > 5000)
4665  {
4666  pm->pmext->sprintTime += rechargebase * pml.frametime; // adjusted for framerate independence
4667  }
4668  }
4669 
4670  if (pm->pmext->sprintTime > SPRINTTIME)
4671  {
4672  pm->pmext->sprintTime = SPRINTTIME;
4673  }
4674 
4675  pm->ps->sprintExertTime = 0;
4676  }
4677  }
4678 }

4686 void PmoveSingle(pmove_t *pmove)
4687 {
4688  // update conditional values for anim system
4689  BG_AnimUpdatePlayerStateConditions(pmove);
4690 
4691  pm = pmove;
4692 
4693  // this counter lets us debug movement problems with a journal
4694  // by setting a conditional breakpoint fot the previous frame

5000  if (PM_FIXEDPHYSICS)
5001  {
5002  // Pmove accurate code
5003  // the new way: don't care so much about 6 bytes/frame
5004  // or so of network bandwidth, and add some mostly framerate-
5005  // independent error to make up for the lack of rounding error
5006  // halt if not going fast enough (0.5 units/sec)
5007  if (VectorLengthSquared(pm->ps->velocity) < 0.25f)
5008  {
5009  VectorClear(pm->ps->velocity);
5010  }
5011  else
5012  {
5013  int i;
5014  float fac;
5015  float fps = PM_FIXEDPHYSICSFPS;
5016 
5017  if (fps > 333)
5018  {
5019  fps = 333;
5020  }
5021  else if (fps < 60)
5022  {
5023  fps = 60;
5024  }
5025 
5026  fac = pml.msec / (1000.0f / fps);
5027 
5028  // add some error...
5029  for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
5030  {
5031  // ...if the velocity in this direction changed enough
5032  if (Q_fabs(pm->ps->velocity[i] - pml.previous_velocity[i]) > 0.5f / fac)
5033  {
5034  if (pm->ps->velocity[i] < 0)
5035  {
5036  pm->ps->velocity[i] -= 0.5f * fac;
5037  }
5038  else
5039  {
5040  pm->ps->velocity[i] += 0.5f * fac;
5041  }
5042  }
5043  }
5044  // we can stand a little bit of rounding error for the sake
5045  // of lower bandwidth
5046  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity, 64.0f, pm->ps->velocity);
5047  // snap some parts of playerstate to save network bandwidth
5048  trap_SnapVector(pm->ps->velocity);
5049  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity, 1.0f / 64.0f, pm->ps->velocity);
5050  }
5051  }
5052  else
5053  {
5054  // snap some parts of playerstate to save network bandwidth
5055  trap_SnapVector(pm->ps->velocity);
5056  }
5057 
5058  // save sprinttime for CG_DrawStaminaBar()
5059  pm->ps->stats[STAT_SPRINTTIME] = pm->pmext->sprintTime;
5060 }

5067 int Pmove(pmove_t *pmove)
5068 {
5069  int msec;
5070  int finalTime = pmove->cmd.serverTime;
5071  int gravity = pmove->ps->gravity;
5072 
5073  if (finalTime < pmove->ps->commandTime)
5074  {
5075  return 0; // should not happen
5076  }
5077 
5078  if (finalTime > pmove->ps->commandTime + 1000)
5079  {
5080  pmove->ps->commandTime = finalTime - 1000;
5081  }
5082 
5083  pmove->ps->pmove_framecount = (pmove->ps->pmove_framecount + 1) & ((1 << PS_PMOVEFRAMECOUNTBITS) - 1);
5084 
5085  pm = pmove;
5086 
5087  // chop the move up if it is too long, to prevent framerate
5088  // dependent behavior
5089  while (pmove->ps->commandTime != finalTime)
5090  {
5091  msec = finalTime - pmove->ps->commandTime;
5092 
5093  if (pmove->pmove_fixed)
5094  {
5095  if (msec > pmove->pmove_msec)
5096  {
5097  msec = pmove->pmove_msec;
5098  }
5099  }
5100  else
5101  {
5102  // this was 66 (15fps), but I've changed it to
5103  // 50 (20fps, max rate of mg42) to alleviate some of the
5104  // framerate dependency with the mg42.
5105  // in reality, this should be split according to sv_fps,
5106  // and pmove() shouldn't handle weapon firing
5107  if (msec > 50)
5108  {
5109  msec = 50;
5110  }
5111  }
5112  pmove->cmd.serverTime = pmove->ps->commandTime + msec;
5113 
5114  pmove->ps->gravity = gravity;
5115  PM_AdjustAimSpreadScale();
5116  PmoveSingle(pmove);
5117 
5118  if (pmove->ps->pm_flags & PMF_JUMP_HELD)
5119  {
5120  pmove->cmd.upmove = 20;
5121  }
5122  }
5123 
5124  if ((pm->ps->stats[STAT_HEALTH] <= 0 || pm->ps->pm_type == PM_DEAD) && (pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags & SURF_MONSTERSLICK))
5125  {
5126  return (pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags);
5127  }
5128  else
5129  {
5130  return 0;
5131  }
5132 }
5133 
5154 void PmovePredict(pmove_t *pmove, float frametime)
5155 {
5156  pm = pmove;
5157  Com_Memset(&pml, 0, sizeof(pml));
5158  pml.frametime = frametime;
5159  PM_GroundTrace();
5160 
5161  // don't bother to figure out gravity if already on the ground
5162  // or moving on a ladder.
5163  if (pml.groundPlane || (pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_LADDER))
5164  {
5165  PM_StepSlideMove(qfalse);
5166  }
5167  else
5168  {
5169  PM_StepSlideMove(qtrue);
5170  }
5171 }
